T02TD2174E:1b-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ma h'a ga na bi dhi:/
T02TD2174E:1b-3: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyor ka chen po'i cho ga /
T02TD2174E:1b-4: [dd] bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:1b-5: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis //
T02TD2174E:1b-6: rig sngags gsang sngags bdag po ru //
T02TD2174E:1b-7: dbang bskur 'byung po tshar gcod pa //
T02TD2174E:1b-8: gsang sngags sdud mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2174E:1b-9: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02TD2174E:1b-10: rgyud rnams ma lus kun dang ni //
T02TD2174E:1b-11: rnal 'byor pha rgyud ma rgyud kyi //
T02TD2174E:1b-12: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang ni //
T02TD2174E:1b-13: rnal 'byor rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud //
T02TD2174E:1b-14: rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal phyir //
T02TD2174E:1b-15: man ngag cung zad dran pa 'di //
T02TD2174E:1b-16: blo dman bsgrub pa'i don du ni //
T02TD2174E:1b-17: rnal 'byor cha rkyen bstan par bya //
T02TD2174E:1b-18: sbyor ba'i rim pa dpag med kyang //
T02TD2174E:1b-19: sgrub pa po yi don slad du //
T02TD2174E:1b-20: dgos pa bsdus pa bstan pa 'di //
T02TD2174E:1b-21: sgrub po slob dpon dang bral na //
T02TD2174E:1b-22: sbyor ba 'di rnams bstan par gsungs //
T02TD2174E:1b-23: de la sbyor ba rim bzhin bstan //
T02TD2174E:1b-24: dang po tshogs gnyis rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD2174E:2a-2: snying gar zla ba'i mandala bsam //
T02TD2174E:2a-4: sgrib pa sbyangs nas phyi nang gsal //
T02TD2174E:2a-5: mdun du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang //
T02TD2174E:2a-6: padma'i gzugs brnyan gsum mam gcig / la la gzhal yas sprul par 'dod //
T02TD2174E:2a-7: de ru dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang //
T02TD2174E:2a-8: bsod nams don phyir spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2174E:2a-9: bla ma sbyang sogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:2a-10: gzhan sogs man ngag bzhin du bya //
T02TD2174E:2a-11: phyag 'tshal phyi nang gsang bas mchod //
T02TD2174E:2a-12: mtshams med mi dge sdom nyams nas //
T02TD2174E:2a-13: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa kun //
T02TD2174E:2a-14: sgyu ma'i sems kyis bshags par bya //
T02TD2174E:2a-15: dge ba kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2174E:2a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul//
T02TD2174E:2a-18: rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2174E:2a-19: rdo rje rnams la lus 'bul lo //
T02TD2174E:2a-20: bsod nams ci bsags thams cad kun //
T02TD2174E:2a-21: byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya //
T02TD2174E:2a-22: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:2a-23: de nas phyi nang snod bcud kun //
T02TD2174E:2a-24: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:2a-25: de nas nam mkha'i chos 'byung la //
T02TD2174E:2a-28: de yi steng du ri rab bskyed //
T02TD2174E:2b-0: de steng rdo rje @2b rgya gram la //
T02TD2174E:2b-2: zla ba'i steng du gnod mdzes sprul //
T02TD2174E:2b-4: khro bo bcu sprul h'um bzhi yi //
T02TD2174E:2b-5: gsang sngags bzlas nas bka' bsgo bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-6: khro bo sprul pas bgegs rnams bkug / yang sgo sku gsung thugs kyi ni //
T02TD2174E:2b-7: phur bu'i sngags brjod tho bas brdung //
T02TD2174E:2b-8: bsregs nas nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:2b-10: rdo rje gur dang ra bar 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:2b-12: gnod mdzes 'od du zhu nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:2b-13: gzhal yas khang ni mdzes par gyur //
T02TD2174E:2b-15: rang gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las //
T02TD2174E:2b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la //
T02TD2174E:2b-17: yi ge a'a lis mtshan par bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-18: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po la //
T02TD2174E:2b-19: yi ge k'a lis mtshan par bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-20: h'um las rdo rje de nyid mtshan //
T02TD2174E:2b-21: byin rlabs bsdus nas 'od du zhu //
T02TD2174E:2b-22: de las sku ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-23: padma dbus kyi lte ba la ;
T02TD2174E:2b-24: / bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02TD2174E:2b-26: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bskyed //
T02TD2174E:2b-28: bcom ldan mgon po nag po bskyed //
T02TD2174E:2b-30: lus ngan rgyal po bskyed par bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed par bya //
T02TD2174E:2b-33: byang shar du ni gnod sbyin bskyed //
T02TD2174E:2b-34: shar lho ru ni ro langs ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-35: lho nub rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-36: nub byang du ni 'jigs byed ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-37: mtshams rnams su ni lha mo bzhi //
T02TD2174E:2b-39: kun bzang ma dang glu sgra ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-40: shar gyi sgo ru srog gcod ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-41: lho yi sgo ru dbugs rngub ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-42: nub kyi phyogs su khrag 'thung ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-43: byang gi phyogs su sha za ma //
T02TD2174E:2b-44: de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:2b-45: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer dang //
T02TD2174E:2b-46: sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshigs bcad sgras //
T02TD2174E:2b-47: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la //
T02TD2174E:2b-48: mchod bstod byas nas dam tshig la //
T02TD2174E:2b-49: byin rlabs bstims te dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2174E:2b-50: de lta'i dkyil 'khor chen po la //
T02TD2174E:2b-51: thun bzhi thun brgyad par dag tu //
T02TD2174E:2b-52: bsgoms nas brtan par gyur pas na //
T02TD2174E:2b-53: las rnams gzhan nam rdzogs rim la //
T02TD2174E:2b-54: gzhug par bya ba kho na yin //
T02TD2174E:2b-55: 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ka ste dang po'o /
T02TD2174E:3a-1: ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:3a-2: dkyil 'khor chen po mi nus pas //
T02TD2174E:3a-3: lha rnams so so kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:3a-4: rgyan gcig pa la sbyor ba bstan //
T02TD2174E:3a-5: dang po gtso bo'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-6: bdag nyid skad cig lhar sprul la //
T02TD2174E:3a-7: yi ge h'um gi man ngag sogs //
T02TD2174E:3a-8: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:3a-9: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang //
T02TD2174E:3a-10: rjes su yi rang bskul ba dang //
T02TD2174E:3a-11: gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su gsol //
T02TD2174E:3a-12: lus 'bul dge rtsa bsngo bar bya //
T02TD2174E:3a-13: tshad med bzhi bsgom stong nyid bsgom //
T02TD2174E:3a-14: stong pa'i ngang las yi ge h'um //
T02TD2174E:3a-15: de las phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD2174E:3a-16: de nyid las ni sku bskyed do //
T02TD2174E:3a-17: sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa //
T02TD2174E:3a-18: mche ba gtsigs mdzad spyan mig bzlog / phyag g-yas rdo rje bsnams mdzad nas //
T02TD2174E:3a-19: phyag g-yon nam mkha' lding ni bsnams //
T02TD2174E:3a-20: g-yon brkyang g-yas ba sku ma klu la shis //
T02TD2174E:3a-21: g-yas pa rdo rje bsnams mdzad nas //
T02TD2174E:3a-22: g-yon pa rtse gsum bsnams pa ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-23: gshin rje dag la shis par bstan //
T02TD2174E:3a-24: g-yas pa rdo rje gsor nas ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-25: g-yon pa dril bu bsgrags pa ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-26: gnod sbyin drag la shis par bstan //
T02TD2174E:3a-27: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstims //
T02TD2174E:3a-28: byin rlabs dbang bskur byas nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:3a-29: thun mtshams bzhir ni brtan par bsgom //
T02TD2174E:3a-30: gtso bo'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD2174E:3a-32: // / bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:3a-33: skad cig lhar sprul thugs ka ru //
T02TD2174E:3a-34: nyi ma'i steng du h'um sogs rdzogs //
T02TD2174E:3a-35: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags par bya //
T02TD2174E:3a-36: rjes su yi rang la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:3a-37: stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:3a-38: stong pa'i ngang las cho 'phrul du //
T02TD2174E:3a-39: rdo rje padma'i nyi zla'i steng //
T02TD2174E:3a-40: de steng h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD2174E:3a-41: rdo rje las ni sku bskyed do //
T02TD2174E:3a-42: khro chen khams gsum rnam rgyal ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-43: sku mdog dmar po dbu gsum pa //
T02TD2174E:3a-44: phyag drug dang po rdo rje'o //
T02TD2174E:3a-45: g-yon gyi dang po dgra sta'o //
T02TD2174E:3a-46: bar ma gnyis kyis 'ching byed pa //
T02TD2174E:3a-47: gung mo mthe bong ngos btud nas //
T02TD2174E:3a-48: gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang ba yin //
T02TD2174E:3a-49: de nyid snying gar bzung nas ni //
T02TD2174E:3a-50: de 'og g-yas pas zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:3a-51: g-yon pa ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2174E:3a-52: ye shes spyan drangs bstims nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:3b-0: byin rlabs @3b dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-1: thun mtshams bzhi ru brtan par bsgoms //
T02TD2174E:3b-2: snying ga'i man ngag gsal nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:3b-3: lce ni rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2174E:3b-5: dus grangs mtshan ma thim pa dang //
T02TD2174E:3b-6: bsgrub pa gang 'dod brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:3b-7: rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD2174E:3b-9: // / bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:3b-10: skad cig lha ru sprul nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:3b-11: h'um gi man ngag rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2174E:3b-12: phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-13: stong pa nyid kyi ngang nyid las //
T02TD2174E:3b-14: rin chen gdan sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:3b-15: yi ge h'um las be con gyur //
T02TD2174E:3b-16: de nyid las ni sku rdzogs gyur //
T02TD2174E:3b-17: dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-18: sku mdog nag po dud sprin 'dra //
T02TD2174E:3b-19: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:3b-20: g-yas pa tsandan be con bsnams //
T02TD2174E:3b-21: g-yon pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2174E:3b-22: zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
T02TD2174E:3b-23: ye shes mgon po spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2174E:3b-24: byin rlabs dbang bskur la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-25: de ltar bstan nas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-26: mgon po mdun du spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2174E:3b-27: bzlas brjod la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:3b-28: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-29: mgon po las kyi sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD2174E:3b-31: // / lus ngan gsung mchog sprul la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:3b-32: skad cig lhar sprul h'um gis ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-33: spyan drangs la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:3b-34: phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-35: stong pa'i ngang las pad sogs gdan //
T02TD2174E:3b-36: yi ge h'um las mchod rten gyur //
T02TD2174E:3b-37: de nyid las ni sku bskyed do //
T02TD2174E:3b-38: lus ngan sku mdog ljang gu'o //
T02TD2174E:3b-39: zhal gcig phyag g-yas mchod rten bsnams /
T02TD2174E:3b-40: g-yon pa le'u le bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2174E:3b-41: ye shes spyan drangs bstims nas ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-42: byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2174E:3b-43: bzlas brjod bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-44: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o//
T02TD2174E:3b-45: lus ngan po'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD2174E:3b-47: // / khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:3b-48: skad cig lhar sprul h'um gis ni //
T02TD2174E:3b-49: sbyor ba la sogs rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-50: de nas phyag 'tshal mchod sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:3b-51: stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje'i gdan //
T02TD2174E:3b-52: de steng h'um las rdo rje'o //
T02TD2174E:4a-2: khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku sngon po //
T02TD2174E:4a-3: zhal gcig phyag gnyis brang du bsnol //
T02TD2174E:4a-4: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
T02TD2174E:4a-5: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2174E:4a-6: byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2174E:4a-7: bsnyen pa la sogs rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:4a-8: de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:4a-9: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o /
T02TD2174E:4a-11: // / mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:4a-12: gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro ma la sogs kyang //
T02TD2174E:4a-13: sprul pa dang ni rang rgyud kyi //
T02TD2174E:4a-14: man ngag rnams ni shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:4a-15: mdun du sprul dang bskyed pa ni //
T02TD2174E:4a-16: gtso bo'i dbang du bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:4a-17: so so rang rang dbang du'o //
T02TD2174E:4a-18: de rnams cho ga la sogs kyang //
T02TD2174E:4a-19: man ngag bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:4a-20: gnod sbyin kha dog dmar nag la //
T02TD2174E:4a-21: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4a-22: g-yas g-yon gri gug cang te'u bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-23: ro langs ma ni sngo skya ste ;
T02TD2174E:4a-24: / zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4a-25: rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung nas ni //
T02TD2174E:4a-26: gung mo srin lag la sogs gsum po rnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-27: dam por bkug pas yongs su bsdams //
T02TD2174E:4a-28: mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste //
T02TD2174E:4a-29: spyi bor nges par bsnol nas bsdams //
T02TD2174E:4a-30: rdo rje mkha' 'gro mdog ser skya //
T02TD2174E:4a-31: phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su //
T02TD2174E:4a-32: me lce'i phreng ba yongs su 'dzin //
T02TD2174E:4a-33: 'jigs byed mdog ni sngo nag la //
T02TD2174E:4a-34: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4a-35: g-yas kyi dang po glang po bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-36: g-yon pa glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-37: de 'og g-yas pa rdo rje bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-38: g-yon pa dgra sta bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2174E:4a-39: de 'og g-yas pa lcags kyu bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-40: g-yon pa mi mgo rlon pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4a-41: gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro de rnams kyang //
T02TD2174E:4a-42: gtso bo gos sngon la bskor lhan ne'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4a-43: dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bsgom thabs dang //
T02TD2174E:4a-44: yang na so so re re dang //
T02TD2174E:4a-45: rje khol tshul du gnas nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:4a-46: las rnams kun la mngags pa dang //
T02TD2174E:4a-47: yang na sbyor thabs tshul gnas nas //
T02TD2174E:4a-48: gsang mchod 'bul zhing phyag rgya bsgrub //
T02TD2174E:4a-49: gnod sbyin mkha' ; gro ma'i sbyor ka steng bdun pa'o /
T02TD2174E:4a-51: // / rdo rje lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:4b-0: @4b lha mo 'di rnams cho ga yang //
T02TD2174E:4b-2: 'od skyed ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo'o //
T02TD2174E:4b-3: phyag gnyis me tog bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2174E:4b-4: yid 'phrog ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-5: sku mdog ser mo mdzes pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-6: phyag gnyis dri yi sbos phor bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-7: kun bzang ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-8: sku mdog dmar mo mdzes pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-9: phyag gnyis zhal zas ro brgya ldan pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-10: glu sgra can ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-11: sku mdog sngon mo mdzes pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-12: phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar gyis rol ;
T02TD2174E:4b-13: / lha mo 'di rnams kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:4b-14: dkyil 'khor las dang mchod pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-15: gsum pa'i man ngag shes mod kyang //
T02TD2174E:4b-16: khyad par mchod pa'i tshul du bstan //
T02TD2174E:4b-17: mchod pa'i lha mo'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o /
T02TD2174E:4b-19: // / sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:4b-20: sgo ma'i cho ga la sogs kyang //
T02TD2174E:4b-21: gong gi cho ga sbyor shes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:4b-22: srog gcod zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-23: sku mdog mthing ga 'jigs pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-24: phyag gnyis thob zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-25: dbugs rngub ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-26: sku mdog ser mo 'jigs pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-27: phyag gnyis hom gzar zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-28: khrag 'thung ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-29: sku mdog dmar mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2174E:4b-30: phyag gnyis gri gug zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-31: sha za ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:4b-32: sku mdog sngon po 'jigs pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:4b-33: phyag gnyis rnon po zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2174E:4b-34: khro mo 'di rnams spyad tshul yang /
T02TD2174E:4b-36: khyad par gsad pa'i las la shis //
T02TD2174E:4b-37: sgo ma bzhi'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o /

T02TD2174E:7b-38: aom pra tam sta n'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-39: aom sha so gu p'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-40: aom ra ga dha pri ya ni h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-41: aom badzra d'a ka ye h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-42: aom ya manta sa pakshi ni h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-43: aom badzra ba ra ye h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-44: aom rakta ka ra lo ka bi sha na /
T02TD2174E:7b-45: n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a n'a ye /
T02TD2174E:7b-46: na gva la ga ra ba ra ta ke tva by'a ghra tsarma ni ba sa ni ya bha ma ko re ga ru ra ru stim ti mam /
T02TD2174E:7b-47: kro dha mu rten tree lokya tra ha ya //
T02TD2174E:7b-48: bhr'um me na ko pa yas na ru dr'a ya n'a ga ra tsa tu rm'a ra bhaksha ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-49: aom tre lo kya bi dza ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:7b-50: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:7b-51: pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-0: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba @8a * //
T02TD2174E:8a-2: dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-3: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-4: a'a lo ke p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-5: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-6: gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-7: aom n'i l'ambara dhara badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-8: nee bi tye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-9: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-10: shabda p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-11: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-12: tsa ri p'u dza me bha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-13: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-14: ta ra ni r+y'a ta y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-15: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-16: bstra ni r+y'a ta y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-17: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-18: gandha rba ni r+y'a ta y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-19: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-20: ma ni ratna sarba bastu ni r'atna y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-21: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mandala de ba t'a n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-22: spha rshe ni r+y'a ta y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-23: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na a'arya aartha siddha ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:8a-24: aom ma ni dha ri badzra p'a ni h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:8a-25: aom bastu ratna ba ti h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-26: aom aa mri ta si ti h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-27: aom sam ma shi ta ya ba ra ba h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-28: aom tsamba sha sa pa ri h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-29: aom ku m'a ri bha dza sha ma ni h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-30: aom badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-31: aom badzra p'a ni h'um h'um /
T02TD2174E:8a-33: bho bho ban n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye /
T02TD2174E:8a-34: ai dam n'i l'amba ra dha ra sha r'i ram badzra p'a n'i /
T02TD2174E:8a-35: hri da ya na sa ma ya ma ti kra ma te autstsha ta nam /
T02TD2174E:8a-40: ma ti pra ti ba ba ta /
T02TD2174E:8a-41: ha ra ha ra n'a ga n'am /
T02TD2174E:8a-42: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02TD2174E:8a-44: n'a ga hri da ya ni /
T02TD2174E:8a-46: bi si n'a ge ta ma ni dam ma na da /
T02TD2174E:8a-47: n'a ga sha r'i ra na /
T02TD2174E:8a-51: n'a ga bi dha ra n'a m'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-52: n'a ga autstsha ta n'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-53: n'i l'amba sa n'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-54: aa pra ti ha na ba la ba ra kra m'a ya h'um phat //
T02TD2174E:8a-56: kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-58: ku sha ta na autta n'a ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-59: pre ta bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-60: yaksha aa pasma ra bi n'a sha ka ra ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8a-63: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD2174E:8a-64: n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni /
T02TD2174E:8a-65: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02TD2174E:8a-67: bi n'a sha ka ra ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8b-0: @8b sarba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka ra ya phat /
T02TD2174E:8b-1: r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:8b-2: sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2174E:8b-3: bsnyen dang bsgrub pa las kyi sbyor ka'i sngags kyi rim par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:8b-4: dbye ba'i rim pa ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:8b-6: de brtson slob dpon la gus pas //
T02TD2174E:8b-7: ser sna g-yo sgyu med pas su //
T02TD2174E:8b-8: yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas la //
T02TD2174E:8b-9: yang yang mnyan pas man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:8b-10: the tshom med pa shin tu gces //
T02TD2174E:8b-11: de bas man ngag can ni btsal //
T02TD2174E:8b-12: man ngag med pa'i nan rtags la //
T02TD2174E:8b-13: dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2174E:8b-14: sngags kyi sbyor ka ste bco lnga pa'o /
T02TD2174E:8b-17: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:8b-18: sngags rnams kyi ni btu ba'i mchog / byas pas the tshom sel bar 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:8b-19: phyag 'tshal mgo la brgyan par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-20: k'a li'i sde tshan bzhi pa yis //
T02TD2174E:8b-21: bzhi pa dag la ais su brgyan //
T02TD2174E:8b-22: k'a li'i sde tshan drug pa yi //
T02TD2174E:8b-23: gsum pa dag la mas su brgyan //
T02TD2174E:8b-24: pa zhes bya ba yi ge la //
T02TD2174E:8b-25: ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge btags //
T02TD2174E:8b-27: da la ha btags de'o gar //
T02TD2174E:8b-28: de 'og ba dang dza la ni //
T02TD2174E:8b-29: ra btags pa ni de yi 'og / na la ais su brgyan h'um phat //
T02TD2174E:8b-30: yang na h'um gnyis sogs pa'am //
T02TD2174E:8b-31: yi ge bcu gsum pa zhes bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-32: tsheg bar chod pa'i dbang du byas //
T02TD2174E:8b-33: aom gyi yi ge dang por mtshan //
T02TD2174E:8b-34: yi ge na la ais su brgyan //
T02TD2174E:8b-35: yi ge la la mas su brgyan //
T02TD2174E:8b-36: ba la ta ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-37: ra yi yi ge gcig pu gnas //
T02TD2174E:8b-38: da la ha ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-39: ra yi yi ge gcig pu gnas //
T02TD2174E:8b-40: ba dang dza ni sdebs pa la //
T02TD2174E:8b-41: yi ge ra ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-42: ba ni gcig pu gnas pa la //
T02TD2174E:8b-43: na la ais su brgyan par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-44: ma dang ha dang ya dang gsum //
T02TD2174E:8b-45: gdags pa med de so sor gnas //
T02TD2174E:8b-46: ka la sha ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-47: sa la ais su brgyan par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-48: na dang pa dang ta dang gsum //
T02TD2174E:8b-49: gdags pa med de lugs su gnas //
T02TD2174E:8b-50: ya la aes su brgyan par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-51: ha la au ni btags nas su //
T02TD2174E:8b-52: zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya //
T02TD2174E:8b-53: pha ni gcig pu ta ni bzlog / yang na h'um gsum phat kyang gsum //
T02TD2174E:8b-54: h'um gnyis dang ni phat gnyis ni //
T02TD2174E:9a-2: man ngag can gyis shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-3: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig ces //
T02TD2174E:9a-4: tsheg bar bcad par shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-5: yang na h'um gnyis bsnan pa rtsa gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:9a-6: ya yi yi ge drag po gnyis //
T02TD2174E:9a-7: bsnan pas rtsa bzhi pa zhes bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-8: de yang drag po'i skabs yin pas //
T02TD2174E:9a-9: khyad par du ni shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-10: yi ge rkang grangs dbang byas na //
T02TD2174E:9a-11: de ltar ma nges rtsa drug nas //
T02TD2174E:9a-12: sum cu rtsa gcig par du yod //
T02TD2174E:9a-13: aom gyi yi ge dang por mtshan //
T02TD2174E:9a-14: mtshan gyi yi ge'i steng du ni //
T02TD2174E:9a-15: ma dang ha dang tsha dang na dang ni //
T02TD2174E:9a-16: da la ha ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-17: ra la aos su brgyan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:9a-18: sha dang na dang ha la au //
T02TD2174E:9a-19: zla tshes thig le ha la brgyan //
T02TD2174E:9a-20: pha dang ta log yi ge'o //
T02TD2174E:9a-21: yi ge bcu gsum zhes su bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-22: yi ge drug ces bya ba ni //
T02TD2174E:9a-23: mtshan gyi man ngag kho na'o //
T02TD2174E:9a-24: sv'a h'a aom dang ho dang gsum //
T02TD2174E:9a-25: zhi rgyas dbang gi yi ge mtha' //
T02TD2174E:9a-26: dza sogs pa yi yi ge rnams //
T02TD2174E:9a-27: 'gugs pa la sogs mtha' ru bstan //
T02TD2174E:9a-28: man ngag can gyis sbyor zhes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:9a-29: yi ge h'um ni 'bru gcig po //
T02TD2174E:9a-30: 'di yang bzlas pa'i yi ge snying po yin //
T02TD2174E:9a-31: yi ge btu ba ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:9a-33: de bas nan tan bskyed de btu //
T02TD2174E:9a-34: lha rnams gzhan po'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD2174E:9a-35: bdag gis btab ma nus pas //
T02TD2174E:9a-36: slob dpon la ni gus bya'i phyir //
T02TD2174E:9a-37: slob dpon rna brgyud man ngag las //
T02TD2174E:9a-38: yi ge btu pa shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-39: yi ge btu ba'i sbyor ba ste bcu drug pa'o /
T02TD2174E:9a-41: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:9a-42: bzlas brjod man ngag bstan par bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-43: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
T02TD2174E:9a-44: bla med bzlas brjod bzhi ru bstan //
T02TD2174E:9a-45: dang po phyi yi bzlas pa ni ;
T02TD2174E:9a-46: / sems dpa' sum brtsegs tshul du bya //
T02TD2174E:9a-47: de ni kun gyi thun mong yin //
T02TD2174E:9a-48: khyad par re re'am gnyis sdebs su //
T02TD2174E:9a-49: las kyi khyad par skabs dang sbyar //
T02TD2174E:9a-50: mtshon gang nas dang rta rnga'i tshad //
T02TD2174E:9a-51: mtshon gyi sum cha de yi phyed //
T02TD2174E:9a-52: padma la sogs mtshon gyi phyed //
T02TD2174E:9a-53: rin chen smug po gur lta bu //
T02TD2174E:9a-54: ngang pa'i rgyu yi tshad tsam mo //
T02TD2174E:9a-55: yang na dar mo gru gsum ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-0: tsi ta'i tshad tsam nyid du @9b 'dod //
T02TD2174E:9b-1: de lta'i gnas ni nyid du yang //
T02TD2174E:9b-2: ye shes bzhugs pa'i gnas su 'dod //
T02TD2174E:9b-3: la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-4: rang byung nyid du yod par 'dod //
T02TD2174E:9b-5: de ni rgyu'am nus pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:9b-6: la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-7: de nyid las ni sprul pa yi //
T02TD2174E:9b-8: kun brtags de la de skad gdags //
T02TD2174E:9b-9: gzhan yang gzhung lugs mi mthun pa'i //
T02TD2174E:9b-10: dang po dbang bskur dus su ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-11: dang por dkyil 'khor bcug pa'i lha dang ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-12: de nyid so so tha dad 'dod //
T02TD2174E:9b-13: thugs ka dbu steng gong 'og gnas //
T02TD2174E:9b-14: lha nyid 'jug pa'i tshul la yang //
T02TD2174E:9b-15: khor lo rdzogs pa'am lha de nyid ;
T02TD2174E:9b-16: / bdag nyid man ngag thob gzhung gis //
T02TD2174E:9b-17: lha de rkyen gyi tshul yin la //
T02TD2174E:9b-18: rang 'byung nus pa rgyu yin pas //
T02TD2174E:9b-19: gnyis med gcig tu sdebs te bsgoms //
T02TD2174E:9b-20: de ltar the tshom bcad nas ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-21: rang gi rig pa pho brang nyid //
T02TD2174E:9b-22: shin tu gsal bar sbyangs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-23: ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul //
T02TD2174E:9b-24: dang po 'od zer spros nas ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-25: ye shes spyan drangs lha de la //
T02TD2174E:9b-26: mtshan ma la sogs gsal nas ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-27: 'khor lo bzhin du dbul ba dang //
T02TD2174E:9b-28: padma brtsegs dang rin chen thag / de nyid thun mong shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:9b-30: shes rab sbyor thabs mchod pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:9b-32: lce ni rdo rje dkar por bsgyur //
T02TD2174E:9b-33: yang na sngo ljang nyid du bya //
T02TD2174E:9b-34: nyi ma shar ba bzhin du gdal //
T02TD2174E:9b-35: de ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:9b-36: drag po bsgrub pa'i gnas skabs su //
T02TD2174E:9b-37: man ngag gong bzhin bzlog ste gsal //
T02TD2174E:9b-38: lce ni rdo rje ser po dang //
T02TD2174E:9b-39: dmar po rgyas dang dbang la shis //
T02TD2174E:9b-40: mthing ga drag po'i tshul du bstan //
T02TD2174E:9b-42: las kyi rim pa'i skabs dang sbyar //
T02TD2174E:9b-43: ba thag tsha tsha'i tshul dang ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-44: drag po kho na'i skabs dang sbyar ;
T02TD2174E:9b-45: / rdul chu brug pa bzhin du'am //
T02TD2174E:9b-46: srin po dur skad ji bzhin du //
T02TD2174E:9b-47: shin tu drag cing myur bar bzlas //
T02TD2174E:9b-48: las kyi khyad par gzhan dag la //
T02TD2174E:9b-49: spros te sbyang ba'i tshul dang ni //
T02TD2174E:9b-50: 'od zer sbu gu btsugs pa dang //
T02TD2174E:9b-51: me yi tshul gyis bsregs pa dang //
T02TD2174E:9b-52: lcags kyu lta bus bkug pa dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-0: @10a * // mtshon cha char bzhin dbab pa dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-1: 'khor lo bzhin du bskor ba dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-2: mnan pa'i tshul du bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-3: mda' zam tshul du bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-5: 'phen sdud tshul du bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-6: dang pos bskug la gnyis pas bsreg /
T02TD2174E:10a-7: dang pos bkug la gnyis pas bsad //
T02TD2174E:10a-8: dang pos bkug la gnyis pas mnan //
T02TD2174E:10a-9: yang na gsum sdebs tshul gyis bya //
T02TD2174E:10a-10: bzhi sdebs lnga sdebs pa yang yin //
T02TD2174E:10a-11: sdebs sbyor cho ga thams cad kyang //
T02TD2174E:10a-12: man ngag bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:10a-13: de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams //
T02TD2174E:10a-14: brgyud pa las ni shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:10a-15: de rnams bzlas brjod byed pa yang //
T02TD2174E:10a-16: sems ni gzhan du mi g-yeng zhing //
T02TD2174E:10a-17: tshig gzhan gyis ni bar mi chod //
T02TD2174E:10a-18: yi ge man ngag ma nyams par //
T02TD2174E:10a-19: sgra yi brjod tshul skabs dang sbyar //
T02TD2174E:10a-20: de la nan tan cher bskyed la //
T02TD2174E:10a-22: mtshan ma'i dngos grub gsum po yang //
T02TD2174E:10a-23: dang po rab la gsum du bstan //
T02TD2174E:10a-24: sprul dang yang sprul sum sprul lo //
T02TD2174E:10a-25: 'bring la sgra dang dri dang ni //
T02TD2174E:10a-26: 'od du yang ni bstan pa yin //
T02TD2174E:10a-27: tha ma nam smad nam stod dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-28: nyin mo dag dang gsum du bstan ;
T02TD2174E:10a-29: / de dag rtags rnams kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:10a-30: gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-31: dri ni zhim dang mi zhim dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-32: sgra ni snyan dang mi snyan dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-33: ro yang zhim dang mi zhim dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-35: ljang dang nag la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2174E:10a-36: rtags la sogs pa de dag la ;
T02TD2174E:10a-37: / gsum dang bdun dang bco lnga dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-38: nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag tu brtag / thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur dang //
T02TD2174E:10a-39: phung po khams gsal ting 'dzin gsal //
T02TD2174E:10a-40: 'od la sogs pa zhi ba'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:10a-41: de sogs rtags rnams byung ba na //
T02TD2174E:10a-42: lha yi dngos grub yin par brtag / mtshan ma la sogs mi brtan zhing //
T02TD2174E:10a-43: phung po la sogs mos 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2174E:10a-44: ting 'dzin rnams ni mi gsal ba //
T02TD2174E:10a-46: de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams kyang //
T02TD2174E:10a-47: bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:10a-48: rtags rnams de rnams byung na yang //
T02TD2174E:10b-0: @10b don dam rang bzhin med pa la //
T02TD2174E:10b-1: kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bu'i sems //
T02TD2174E:10b-2: re dang dogs pa rnams spangs te //
T02TD2174E:10b-3: dga' dang mi dga'i sems mi bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-4: 'jigs pa la sogs sems spangs te //
T02TD2174E:10b-5: mandala me tog bcas phul nas / sbyin sreg 'khor lo la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-6: de ltar byas tshe mkha' 'gro mas //
T02TD2174E:10b-7: lung bstan gnas su khrid pa dang //
T02TD2174E:10b-8: man ngag 'jigs pa med pas blang //
T02TD2174E:10b-9: bdud kyi ltas rnams 'byung ba ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-10: gong bzhin byas pas med par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:10b-11: nang na mtshan ma bsnyen pa gtso //
T02TD2174E:10b-12: de 'og grangs kyi bsnyen par gtso //
T02TD2174E:10b-13: dus kyi bsnyen pa tha ma'o //
T02TD2174E:10b-14: grangs kyi rab 'bring tha ma ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-16: sum 'bum dag tu shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-17: rnam rgyal la sogs bzhi po la //
T02TD2174E:10b-19: 'khor rnams lhag ma kun la ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-20: khri dang nyi khri sum khri'o //
T02TD2174E:10b-21: yang na lha rnams so so yi //
T02TD2174E:10b-22: sku gcig bsnyen pa byed pa na //
T02TD2174E:10b-23: rab kyi bsnyen pa sum 'bum mo //
T02TD2174E:10b-25: tha ma'i bsnyen pa bye ba'o //
T02TD2174E:10b-26: dus la yang ni gsum gsum yod //
T02TD2174E:10b-27: zla gcig zla gnyis zla gsum par //
T02TD2174E:10b-28: lo phyed zla dgu lo gcig gi /
T02TD2174E:10b-29: lo gnyis dang ni lo gsum dang //
T02TD2174E:10b-30: lo bzhi tha mar shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-31: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2174E:10b-32: dam tshig nyams pa yin pas na //
T02TD2174E:10b-33: sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor la sogs kyis //
T02TD2174E:10b-34: dam tshig nyams pa bskang nas ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-35: slar la sogs pa'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-36: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2174E:10b-37: rnal 'byor sdig sgrib che bas na //
T02TD2174E:10b-38: sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor la sogs kyis //
T02TD2174E:10b-39: sdig sgrib la sogs sbyangs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-40: slar la sogs pa'i cho ga bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-41: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2174E:10b-42: yang na bsgom pa gcig pus bya //
T02TD2174E:10b-43: yang na bzlas brjod gcig pus so //
T02TD2174E:10b-44: bsgom dang bzlas pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD2174E:10b-45: byung bar de ni ma gyur na //
T02TD2174E:10b-46: tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD2174E:10b-47: gtor ma la sogs so so la //
T02TD2174E:10b-48: man ngag cho ga thob pas na //
T02TD2174E:10b-50: de dag thams cad kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:11a-3: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2174E:11a-4: mtshan ma gsum mam nus pa brtag / yungs kar dag la sngags bzlas nas //
T02TD2174E:11a-5: shing ljon pa sogs me tog la //
T02TD2174E:11a-6: btab nas bskams gyur rab yin no //
T02TD2174E:11a-7: chu la bzlas te gtor ba na //
T02TD2174E:11a-8: char pa la sogs 'bebs pa dang //
T02TD2174E:11a-9: thal ba la ni sngags bzlas na //
T02TD2174E:11a-10: char ba la sogs gcod par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:11a-11: de ni 'bring gi nus pa'i rtags //
T02TD2174E:11a-12: yungs kar phyag mtshan la sogs pas //
T02TD2174E:11a-13: sngags bzlas gtor zhing brabs pa yis //
T02TD2174E:11a-14: gdon dang nad la sogs pa sel //
T02TD2174E:11a-15: de ni tha ma'i nus pa'i rtags //
T02TD2174E:11a-16: de ltar byas kyang ma byung na //
T02TD2174E:11a-17: lha sogs man ngag thams cad spro //
T02TD2174E:11a-18: khams dang bag chags med phyir ro //
T02TD2174E:11a-19: cho ga thams cad gong bzhin no //
T02TD2174E:11a-20: man ngag mi mthun gzhan yang sbyar //
T02TD2174E:11a-21: de ltar byas na dngos grub 'byung ;
T02TD2174E:11a-22: / dngos grub byung bar ma gyur kyang //
T02TD2174E:11a-23: sgrib pa rnams ni mgo mnan nas //
T02TD2174E:11a-24: tshogs chen khyad par bsags nas ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-26: skye ba phyi ma la sogs su //
T02TD2174E:11a-27: dngos grub rnams ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:11a-28: dngos grub khyad par ma thob na //
T02TD2174E:11a-29: skye ba bdun la gdon mi za //
T02TD2174E:11a-30: nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-31: rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyis ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-32: snying ga'i 'khor lo la sogs la //
T02TD2174E:11a-33: rang 'byung yi ge nus pa ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-34: rlung gi rta la zhon nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:11a-35: snying ga'i 'khor lo la sogs bskor //
T02TD2174E:11a-36: gsang ba'i bzlas brjod man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-37: byang chub sems kyi man ngag gam //
T02TD2174E:11a-38: phyag rgya la brten ji bzhin no //
T02TD2174E:11a-39: mthar thug gi ni bzlas pa yang //
T02TD2174E:11a-40: snang ba gsum gyi mtha' la ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-41: me rtog ye shes stong nyid gsal //
T02TD2174E:11a-42: de ni bzlas pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2174E:11a-43: bzlas pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:11a-44: rnal 'byor blo dman don du bstan //
T02TD2174E:11a-45: bzlas brjod kyi man ngag gi sbyor ka ste bcu bdun pa'o /
T02TD2174E:11a-47: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:11a-48: rdzogs rim man ngag cung zhig bstan //
T02TD2174E:11a-49: dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs dang //
T02TD2174E:11a-50: bles su bsam pa'i rim pa yi /
T02TD2174E:11b-0: @11b dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs dag la yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-1: rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems //
T02TD2174E:11b-2: tsa yi gtso bo dh'u t'i yin //
T02TD2174E:11b-3: dh'u t'a nyid kyi gzhung lugs kyang //
T02TD2174E:11b-4: srog rtsa nang du rgyu ba dang //
T02TD2174E:11b-6: de la sogs pa'i gzhung lugs mang //
T02TD2174E:11b-7: bdag gi gzhung gis nang du rgyu //
T02TD2174E:11b-8: shin tu phra ba rta rnga tshad //
T02TD2174E:11b-9: de bas phra bar 'dod pa'ang yod //
T02TD2174E:11b-10: dbugs kyi dngos ma shin tu phra //
T02TD2174E:11b-11: 'od dang ldan pa nyid la ni //
T02TD2174E:11b-12: byang chub sems ni til mar bzhin //
T02TD2174E:11b-13: de la khyab par brten pa yi //
T02TD2174E:11b-14: g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa gnyis ni //
T02TD2174E:11b-15: la la n'a dang ras n'a //
T02TD2174E:11b-16: mdun gyi rtsa ni dad dznya //
T02TD2174E:11b-17: de rnams tshad la sogs pa yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-18: dh'u t'i nyid dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD2174E:11b-19: rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams la yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-20: gzhung lugs mi 'dra mang du bstan //
T02TD2174E:11b-24: rdo rje nor bu'i cha la yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-25: pho brang bzhi yi gnas rtag tu //
T02TD2174E:11b-28: aindra bh'u ti gzhung lugs yin //
T02TD2174E:11b-29: rlung gi gzhung lugs dag la yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-30: lte ba'i lkog dang lte ba dang //
T02TD2174E:11b-31: snying ga mgrin pa yan lag gi / gnas ni lnga po dag las kyang //
T02TD2174E:11b-32: srog gi rlung dang gyen du rgyu //
T02TD2174E:11b-33: me dang mnyam nas thur du sel //
T02TD2174E:11b-34: kun la khyab pa'i rlung rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:11b-35: gnas lnga tha dad gtso bo yin //
T02TD2174E:11b-36: yan lag lnga dang dbang po lnga //
T02TD2174E:11b-37: de ltar tha dad 'dod pa'ang yod //
T02TD2174E:11b-38: bdag gi gzhung gi gnas skabs kyis //
T02TD2174E:11b-39: las kyi sgo nas phye bas na //
T02TD2174E:11b-40: thams cad ngo bo gcig yin no //
T02TD2174E:11b-41: byang sems 'bebs pa'i gtum mo yang //
T02TD2174E:11b-42: 'khor lo brten dang mi brten pa'i //
T02TD2174E:11b-43: dregs 'dzin ma ni bcu bzhi po //
T02TD2174E:11b-44: aindra bh'u ti la sogs gzhung //
T02TD2174E:11b-45: rang bzhin gtum mo 'dod par ni //
T02TD2174E:11b-46: mkhas pa rnams ni kun ka mthun //
T02TD2174E:11b-47: byang chub sems la gnyis yod do //
T02TD2174E:11b-48: don dam dang ni kun rdzob bo //
T02TD2174E:11b-49: kun rdzob la yang gnyis yod de //
T02TD2174E:11b-50: snyigs mar gyur dang bcud du gyur //
T02TD2174E:11b-51: bcud du gyur la gnyis yod de //
T02TD2174E:11b-52: til mar bzhin du khyab pa dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-0: @12a * // de la brten pa'i man ngag tshogs //
T02TD2174E:12a-1: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:12a-2: bsam zhing bsgom pa'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2174E:12a-3: rang 'byung yi ge'i gnas tshul ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-4: yi ge h'um dang aa dang ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-5: aom dang ham gi rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD2174E:12a-6: man ngag sbyor rdzogs shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:12a-7: 'khor lo rnams ni gsal byas la //
T02TD2174E:12a-8: lte bar k'a li nyis lnga pa po //
T02TD2174E:12a-9: snying gar dang po sde tshan dang po brgyad //
T02TD2174E:12a-10: mgrin par a'a li bcu drug po //
T02TD2174E:12a-11: dung khang la ni nyis ldab bo //
T02TD2174E:12a-12: gtum mo zhes bya lte ba'i lkog / sor gnyis sor bzhi sor drug tu //
T02TD2174E:12a-13: mar me bzhin du gnas pa las //
T02TD2174E:12a-14: rlung ma nyid ma'i stobs kyis su //
T02TD2174E:12a-15: las kyi rlung ni sngon mo bcus //
T02TD2174E:12a-16: sbar nas de la gtad par bya //
T02TD2174E:12a-17: rtags brgyad byung nas shin tu spar //
T02TD2174E:12a-18: dga' ba la sogs rim skyes pas //
T02TD2174E:12a-19: rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:12a-21: gsum la sogs pa'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-22: rim pa bzhin du sbyor shes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:12a-23: rlung rnams g-yas dang g-yon du ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-24: gnyi gar rgyu dang dal bar rgyu //
T02TD2174E:12a-25: de la gtad pa'i rim gyis ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-26: spro bar nus na bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2174E:12a-27: rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong nyid 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:12a-28: yang na thig le'i rnam pa la //
T02TD2174E:12a-29: spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-30: lnga ru blta dang gcig tu blta //
T02TD2174E:12a-31: rim gyis bstan par gyur nas ni //
T02TD2174E:12a-32: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02TD2174E:12a-33: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ka ste bco brgyad pa'o /
T02TD2174E:12a-35: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:12a-36: bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga bstan pa ;
T02TD2174E:12a-38: cho ga che chung gi rim pa bsgrub bya'i skabs dang sbyar te /
T02TD2174E:12a-39: thabs dpag tu med par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:12a-40: de la rdzas kyis bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2174E:12a-42: stang stabs kyis bskrad pa dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-44: ting nge 'dzin gyis bskrad pa dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-45: yang na rdzas dang sngags kyis bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2174E:12a-46: rdzas dang stang stabs kyis bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2174E:12a-47: rdzas dang phyag rgyas bskrad pa dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-48: rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskrad pa dang //
T02TD2174E:12a-49: yang na sngags dang gnyis 'dus dang //
T02TD2174E:12b-2: phyag rgya stang stabs gnyis 'dus pa dang /
T02TD2174E:12b-3: bzhi ka la ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-4: phyag rgya la yang de bzhin te //
T02TD2174E:12b-5: ting nge 'dzin kyang de ltar bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-7: thams cad kun la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-8: yang na lnga 'dus kho nas bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-9: bgegs kyi rim pa'ang lngar shes bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-10: sne gdon phra mo kun la ni //
T02TD2174E:12b-11: sbyor ka gcig pu kho nas bzlog / rgyal 'gong la sogs gdon la ni //
T02TD2174E:12b-12: sbyor ba gnyis kyis bzlog par bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-13: de bas mtho ba'i bgegs gnyis la //
T02TD2174E:12b-14: gsum dang bzhi ni bya ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-15: bgegs ni chen po thams cad la //
T02TD2174E:12b-16: sbyor ba lnga po kho nas bya //
T02TD2174E:12b-17: rdzas kyi bya thabs bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:12b-18: gu gul yungs kar sha chen dang //
T02TD2174E:12b-19: tshil chen dang ni thal chen dang //
T02TD2174E:12b-20: dur khrod sol ba grog mkhar sa //
T02TD2174E:12b-21: de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la //
T02TD2174E:12b-22: gzugs brnyan bca' bar bya ba'am //
T02TD2174E:12b-23: brdeg pa'i rdzas su bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:12b-24: bdug pa'i rdzas su bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:12b-25: bsrung pa'i rdzas su bya ba ni //
T02TD2174E:12b-26: gla rtsi dang ni rma bya yi //
T02TD2174E:12b-27: rgyal mtshan klu la shis par bstan //
T02TD2174E:12b-28: yang na dur khrod chen po'i rdzas //
T02TD2174E:12b-29: rgyan cha rnams kyis byin brlabs la //
T02TD2174E:12b-30: bskon pas srung bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-31: sku ni byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD2174E:12b-32: bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-33: sku dang glegs bam la sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:12b-34: byin gyis brlabs nas mdun bzhag pas //
T02TD2174E:12b-35: bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-36: rdo rje dril bu la sogs phyag mtshan la //
T02TD2174E:12b-37: byin gyis brlabs nas lag bzhag na //
T02TD2174E:12b-38: bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-39: khyad par nag po chen po yi //
T02TD2174E:12b-40: sku ni byin brlabs bzhag pas su //
T02TD2174E:12b-41: bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-42: skud sngon mdud pa bdun byas nas //
T02TD2174E:12b-43: mgul du bcings pas bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:12b-44: yang na smyag shad lcug ma yis //
T02TD2174E:12b-45: byabs pas de ni tshar gcod do //
T02TD2174E:12b-46: de la sogs pa'i mthun rdzas rnams //
T02TD2174E:12b-47: thams cad kyis ni bya ba yin //
T02TD2174E:12b-48: 'khor lo bcas nas lus la gdags //
T02TD2174E:12b-49: bsrung pa'i mchog ni yin par gsungs //
T02TD2174E:12b-50: sngags kyis bskrad pa bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:13a-1: ra dha ra badzra p'a ni che ge mo h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:13a-3: m'a ra ya phat gdags pa ni gsad pa'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-4: yang na 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-5: aom na mo n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:13a-6: ces bya ba dang spel te bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-7: bsgrub bya'i ming gi mtha' la sreg byed kyi yi ge dang ldan pa ni bgegs zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2174E:13a-8: ming gi mtha' la bsrung ba'i sngags dang ldan pa ni bsrung pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2174E:13a-9: ming gi mtha' la dgug pa dang /
T02TD2174E:13a-10: dbang du bya ba'i sngags kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-11: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pas ni //
T02TD2174E:13a-12: sngags ring kho nas bya ba yin //
T02TD2174E:13a-13: khyad par du ni klu la shis //
T02TD2174E:13a-14: yang na drag po'i sngags 'di ni //
T02TD2174E:13a-15: aom ma h'a tsanda ro sha na h'um h'um phat ces bya ba dang spel te bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-16: yang na rgyud bzhin btub pa dang //
T02TD2174E:13a-17: mi btub pa yi rim pa ni //
T02TD2174E:13a-18: slob dpon so so'i gzhung lugs so //
T02TD2174E:13a-21: man ngag gzhan gyis sbyor shes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-22: stang stabs sbyor bas tshar bcad ni //
T02TD2174E:13a-23: mnyam pa'i stang stabs la sogs pa bco brgyad kyis tshar bcad pa dang //
T02TD2174E:13a-24: pheg rdob skor bu la sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:13a-25: gyad 'gros rnams kyis tshar bcad pa dang /
T02TD2174E:13a-26: g-yas brkyang la sogs pas tshar bcad pa dang /
T02TD2174E:13a-27: de gsum gang yang rung bas bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-28: stang stabs kyi sbyor ba las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-29: phyag rgya la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang /
T02TD2174E:13a-30: lag stabs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13a-32: dang por bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje /
T02TD2174E:13a-40: g-yon brkyang bas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan pa /
T02TD2174E:13a-41: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje gsor ba las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02TD2174E:13a-42: rdo rje phra mo'i mtshon cha grangs med par brgyud mar byung nas /
T02TD2174E:13a-43: spyi gtsug tu brgyab pas rkang pa'i mthil du 'byin pa //
T02TD2174E:13b-0: h'um sgra dang zhags pa'i sgra bsgrags pas thams cad @13b dang ngas shing brgyal bar byed pa //
T02TD2174E:13b-1: sku las khro bo dpag tu med pa byung bas /
T02TD2174E:13b-2: bsgrub bya'i ba spu'i bu gar zhugs nas khrag 'jibs par byed pa /
T02TD2174E:13b-3: thugs ka nas khro bo dpag tu med pa byung nas /
T02TD2174E:13b-4: bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzir ba /
T02TD2174E:13b-5: sku las me dpung byung nas sreg par byed pa /
T02TD2174E:13b-6: zhal nas sngags kyi sgra brjod pas 'byung po thams cad brlag par byed pa /
T02TD2174E:13b-7: de lta bu'i khro bo gcig bsgoms la /
T02TD2174E:13b-10: dbang bskur la nus pa'i mthu can du bya'o //
T02TD2174E:13b-11: bgegs chen po bskrad pa yang /
T02TD2174E:13b-12: cho ga phra mos mi thub ste /
T02TD2174E:13b-13: dang po kho nar sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2174E:13b-14: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bskyed la /
T02TD2174E:13b-15: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i gtor ma gcig byin gyis brlabs la //
T02TD2174E:13b-16: bde bar gshegs pa la dbul /
T02TD2174E:13b-17: mthu bskyed la gsol ba gdab /
T02TD2174E:13b-18: yang gtor ma gcig la thun mong gi rdzas dang ldan pa'i steng du /
T02TD2174E:13b-19: khrag sna snying sna sha sna gsum dang ldan pa'i rdzas la /
T02TD2174E:13b-20: byin gyis brlabs la chos skyong ba'i srung ma la phul la /
T02TD2174E:13b-21: bdag gi stong grogs mdzad par las bsgo'o //
T02TD2174E:13b-22: gtor ma cha gcig la drug cu pa ldan pa'i rdzas la byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2174E:13b-23: 'byung po thams cad la byin la /
T02TD2174E:13b-24: gnod pa ma byed par bsgo ba bya /
T02TD2174E:13b-25: yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs zhi bar bya ste /
T02TD2174E:13b-26: de ltar yang nas yang du byas pas bgegs zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2174E:13b-27: de ltar byas kyang 'gror ma btub na /
T02TD2174E:13b-29: dang po kho na bdag gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i sprul pa bkye bas /
T02TD2174E:13b-30: 'byung po thams cad bkug pa dang /
T02TD2174E:13b-31: yang na nad pa nyid la bsams te /
T02TD2174E:13b-32: yi ge sum las 'phros 'dus pa las /
T02TD2174E:13b-34: ri rab kyis snying gar mnan par bsam /
T02TD2174E:13b-35: de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2174E:13b-38: lce nag po rdo rje sbu gu can du gyur nas /
T02TD2174E:13b-39: de'i nang na tshur 'od zer me 'dra ba byung nas gang la gnod pa'i sar gtad la bgegs thams cad bsreg par bya ste /
T02TD2174E:13b-40: yang na lce rdo rje sngon por bsgyur la /
T02TD2174E:14a-0: 'od zer sngon po rlung 'dra bas thams cad gtor zhing bskrad par bsam @14a * //
T02TD2174E:14a-2: / yang na srog gi 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02TD2174E:14a-3: bgegs thams cad bcom nas slar 'dus pas snying ga'i lha la mchod par bsam mo //
T02TD2174E:14a-4: yang na mdun gyi lha mchod par bsam mo //
T02TD2174E:14a-5: bsreg gtor bcom pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2174E:14a-6: yang na gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T02TD2174E:14a-7: gong gi sku bskyed pa la sogs pa man ngag sbyor ba yod pa rnams /
T02TD2174E:14a-8: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:14a-9: khyad par sbyor ba bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:14a-11: gsung gi yig 'bru spro ba dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-12: sku yi sprul pa spro ba dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-13: yang na thugs kyi phyag mtshan yin //
T02TD2174E:14a-14: lte 'og gnas su bstim pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-15: gnas dgu dag tu bstim pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-16: thams cad kun du bstim pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-17: de ltar bstim la lus dgang ngo //
T02TD2174E:14a-18: thur du bda' dang gyen du bda' //
T02TD2174E:14a-20: 'byung sa gnyis nas gdon pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-21: thams cad bcom nas gdon pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-22: 'dod pa'i tshul gyis bda' ba dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-23: bton nas bzhu btul bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-24: de nas lha la mchod pa bya //
T02TD2174E:14a-25: de la sogs pa'i man ngag gis //
T02TD2174E:14a-26: sbyor ba gzhan yang shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:14a-27: de lta'i sbyor ba byed pa yang //
T02TD2174E:14a-28: phal dang phal gyi thun mong min ;
T02TD2174E:14a-29: / lus kyi rgyan cha la sogs ldan //
T02TD2174E:14a-30: ngag gi ma nyams yon tan ldan //
T02TD2174E:14a-31: bar chad rdul tsam ma shor par //
T02TD2174E:14a-32: dper na rdul chu brug pa bzhin //
T02TD2174E:14a-33: de gsum gsal bar brjod pa yin //
T02TD2174E:14a-34: snod min pa la gsang 'gyur yin //
T02TD2174E:14a-35: dper na srin po dur skad bzhin //
T02TD2174E:14a-36: tshig mi gsal bar don gsal ba //
T02TD2174E:14a-37: yid brtan drag tu bzla bar bya //
T02TD2174E:14a-38: de lta'i bgegs bskrad sbyor ba yang //
T02TD2174E:14a-39: thams cad kun la bya ba min //
T02TD2174E:14a-40: bsgom sgrub par chad byung ba dang //
T02TD2174E:14a-41: slob dpon gzhan don mdzad pa la //
T02TD2174E:14a-42: 'byung pos bar chad byas pa la //
T02TD2174E:14a-43: sbyor ba 'di ni bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2174E:14a-44: rdo rje spun la bya ba yin //
T02TD2174E:14a-45: gzhan yang sems can gzhan po ni //
T02TD2174E:14a-46: mi dge spang zhing dge bcu spyod //
T02TD2174E:14a-47: de la'ang bya bar gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2174E:14a-48: gnyi ga mi byed sems can la //
T02TD2174E:14a-49: sbyor ba chung du bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2174E:14a-50: mi dge bcu ni dang len cing //
T02TD2174E:14b-0: rdo rje slob @14b dpon la smod cing //
T02TD2174E:14b-1: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14b-2: rgyal khams yongs su gnod pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14b-4: theg chen gsang sngags smod pa dang //
T02TD2174E:14b-6: sbyor ba 'di ni byar mi rung //
T02TD2174E:14b-7: gal te sems can de dag kyang //
T02TD2174E:14b-8: gnod zhing 'gyod pas mthol bshags nas //
T02TD2174E:14b-9: sangs rgyas theg pa'i sgor 'jug cing //
T02TD2174E:14b-10: yang dang yang du gsol 'debs na //
T02TD2174E:14b-11: sbyor ba 'di ni byas bar gsungs //
T02TD2174E:14b-12: sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag kyang //
T02TD2174E:14b-13: rang gi srog bzhin ma btsas na //
T02TD2174E:14b-14: snod dang mi ldan la spel nas //
T02TD2174E:14b-15: be'u sbrel g-yang ga ra khrid pa bzhin //
T02TD2174E:14b-16: gcig lhung bas na gnyis ka lhung //
T02TD2174E:14b-17: de bas nan tan cher gyis la //
T02TD2174E:14b-18: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la //
T02TD2174E:14b-19: btsas ka dam bzhag byas te gtang //
T02TD2174E:14b-20: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ka ste bcu dgu pa'o /
T02TD2174E:14b-22: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:14b-23: dug sngags kyi ni gtso bo ru //
T02TD2174E:14b-24: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2174E:14b-25: sngon du bsnyen pa'i man ngag rnams //
T02TD2174E:14b-26: cung zhig bsdus te bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:14b-27: dang po skad cig ltar bsams te //
T02TD2174E:14b-28: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2174E:14b-30: mchod pa la sogs rdzogs byas nas //
T02TD2174E:14b-31: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:14b-32: stong pa nyid kyi ngang las ni //
T02TD2174E:14b-33: pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam //
T02TD2174E:14b-34: padma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2174E:14b-36: rdo rje'i gur du gyur nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:14b-37: cho ga gsum mam skad cig mas //
T02TD2174E:14b-38: phyag na rdo rje'i sku bskyed la //
T02TD2174E:14b-39: don du rdo rje sems shes bya //
T02TD2174E:14b-40: rdo rje bsnams dang chos nyid kyi //
T02TD2174E:14b-41: don la sems dpa'i ye shes la //
T02TD2174E:14b-42: las su ming dang tha dad tsam //
T02TD2174E:14b-43: de nyid sku mdog dkar la 'tsher //
T02TD2174E:14b-44: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02TD2174E:14b-45: rgyan rnams thams cad rdzogs ldan zhing //
T02TD2174E:14b-46: rdo rje skyil krung tshul du bzhugs //
T02TD2174E:14b-47: ye shes spyan drangs snying gar bstim //
T02TD2174E:14b-48: sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2174E:14b-49: de ltar brtan bsgoms thugs ka ru //
T02TD2174E:14b-50: zla ba padma lte ba la //
T02TD2174E:14b-51: man ngag bzhin du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-1: ltar gsal nas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-2: thugs 'khor gsal dang lha mchod dang //
T02TD2174E:15a-3: sbyang dang bsdu ba'i tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2174E:15a-4: 'bum gsum bsnyen pa bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:15a-5: dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi //
T02TD2174E:15a-6: bsnyen pa la sogs tshad phyin nas //
T02TD2174E:15a-7: de nas 'khor rnams so so la //
T02TD2174E:15a-8: 'bum phrag re re bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-9: 'khor rnams bsnyen pa'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-10: mdun du padma'i gdan bskyed de //
T02TD2174E:15a-11: skad cig klu brgyad sprul nas ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-12: spyan drangs la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:15a-14: don rnams gang yin grub par bsam //
T02TD2174E:15a-15: gong bzhin mtshan ma'i rtags phyin nas //
T02TD2174E:15a-16: de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:15a-17: lha bskyed la sogs cho ga ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-18: bsnyen pa'i dus dang mthun par bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-19: gtso bo'i bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig /'khor rnams khri dang stong dang ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-20: brgya yi bar du rab 'bring ngo ;
T02TD2174E:15a-21: / dug gis zin pa'i bsgrub bya ste //
T02TD2174E:15a-22: mdun sogs bya ba rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:15a-23: lus kyi yan lag brgyad po la //
T02TD2174E:15a-24: yi ge dgod sogs bya ba ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-25: mgor kshum sna dang rna bar yum //
T02TD2174E:15a-26: mig du h'um dang khar ni sum //
T02TD2174E:15a-27: mgrin pa smram snying khar ymryum //
T02TD2174E:15a-28: lte bar kshmryum du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:15a-29: kha dog dkar po bsam par bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-30: sngags rnams de yi mthus su ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-31: snying ga'i dug ni bcing bar bya //
T02TD2174E:15a-32: ye shes yi ge h'um gis ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-33: dug 'phrog la sogs man ngag sbyar //
T02TD2174E:15a-34: de 'og phyi ma'i las brtsam mo //
T02TD2174E:15a-37: skyon bral yon tan ldan pa ru //
T02TD2174E:15a-38: chu dang 'o ma bsres pas dgang //
T02TD2174E:15a-39: dang po bum sbyang bum bskyed la //
T02TD2174E:15a-40: padma zla ba'i gdan steng su //
T02TD2174E:15a-41: de steng yi ge sum las ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-42: gyur pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2174E:15a-43: gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan mdzad cing //
T02TD2174E:15a-44: sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2174E:15a-45: kha tv'am thod pa phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2174E:15a-46: sbrul gyi rgyan dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2174E:15a-47: sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung bcas //
T02TD2174E:15a-48: klu rnams mgo bo'i cha rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:15a-50: de steng rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2174E:15a-52: klu chen brgyad po bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-0: shar @15b du nor rgyas bu dkar po //
T02TD2174E:15b-2: nub tu stobs rgyu dmar po ste //
T02TD2174E:15b-4: dbang ldan du ni padma che //
T02TD2174E:15b-5: dkar ser du ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-6: me mtshams su ni dung skyong dkar sngo'o //
T02TD2174E:15b-7: bden bral du ni rigs ldan sdo dmar po //
T02TD2174E:15b-8: rlung mtshams 'khyil pa dmar ser po //
T02TD2174E:15b-9: de ltar klu brgyad bsam pa ni //
T02TD2174E:15b-10: mchod dang gtor ma la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-11: de dus rdo rje mkha' 'gro ru //
T02TD2174E:15b-12: dug sel ba yi dus 'di ru //
T02TD2174E:15b-13: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-14: cho ga bskyed tshul thabs dang mthun //
T02TD2174E:15b-15: rma bya'i sgra yi chun po yis //
T02TD2174E:15b-16: mgo po la sogs lus kun la //
T02TD2174E:15b-17: bya ba cing man ngag sbyor shes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:15b-18: rkang mthil bar du drangs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:15b-19: bum pa'i nang du dbo par bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-20: lha gsal la sogs man ngag bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-21: aom hri tanda ra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-22: zhes bya ba man ngag tu //
T02TD2174E:15b-23: h'um gsum phat gsum shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-24: aom b'a su ki hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-25: aom taksha ka hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-27: aom karko ta hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-28: aom padma hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-29: aom ma h'a padma hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-30: aom sham kha p'a la hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-31: aom ku li sha lam hri tanda ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-32: aom hu lu ta ke li hri tanda ura sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-33: aom hri tanda ra h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD2174E:15b-34: aa mu ka sa ni rba shim ku ru h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-35: aom ba su ki hri tanda re de ba datta nirba shim ku ru h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:15b-36: bsnyen bsgrub la sogs bya ba yang //
T02TD2174E:15b-37: sngags kyi dbye ba la sogs kyang //
T02TD2174E:15b-38: man ngag can gyis sbyor shes bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-40: de 'og yungs kar la sogs kyis //
T02TD2174E:15b-41: sngags bzlas pas su brdeg par bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-42: brdegs pa tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD2174E:15b-44: de yi snying gar yi ge h'um //
T02TD2174E:15b-45: bsgoms pas rnam shes bcings shing gzung //
T02TD2174E:15b-46: de tsam gyis ni dbugs g-yo 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:15b-47: bdag gi sna sgo'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:15b-48: mche bas zin pa'i sna sgor thim //
T02TD2174E:15b-49: lus bkang bas ni rkang lag 'dar //
T02TD2174E:15b-50: de nas h'um gi glu blang bya //
T02TD2174E:15b-51: de yang sngon du se gol gtogs /
T02TD2174E:15b-52: gsum gyi sgra yis ldang bar 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:15b-53: langs nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom //
T02TD2174E:16a-2: klu sman dkar gsum sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD2174E:16a-3: mchod dang gtor ma klu la shis //
T02TD2174E:16a-4: de sogs sbyor ba gzhan ba yang //
T02TD2174E:16a-5: slob dpon mkhas pas sbyor shes bya //
T02TD2174E:16a-6: dug gis zin pa'i gnas bstan pa //
T02TD2174E:16a-7: kha dang smin ma rkan dang ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-8: sna rtse sna sgo mtshan ma dang //
T02TD2174E:16a-9: bshad ba mthe bong gzung ba rnams //
T02TD2174E:16a-10: gso ru mi rung spang bar bya //
T02TD2174E:16a-11: rigs ldan mgo brgya gtsigs pa dang //
T02TD2174E:16a-12: ka ma la ni dug gi mche ba ste //
T02TD2174E:16a-14: lhag ma rnams ni gsor rung bas //
T02TD2174E:16a-15: rnal 'byor snying rje dang ldan pa //
T02TD2174E:16a-16: dbang bskur man ngag ldan pa yis //
T02TD2174E:16a-17: cho ga gzhung bzhin byas pa dang //
T02TD2174E:16a-18: gzhan sgrol stobs kyis bdag kyang sgrol //
T02TD2174E:16a-19: dngos grub kyang ni thob par gsungs //
T02TD2174E:16a-20: de bas brtson 'grus bskyed de bsgrub //
T02TD2174E:16a-21: mchod bstod la sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-22: lha gshegs ting 'dzin bsdu bar bya//
T02TD2174E:16a-23: de 'og smon lam gdab bya ba //
T02TD2174E:16a-24: dper na sman rnams mthu yis ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-25: rdzas kyi dug ni 'joms pa bzhin //
T02TD2174E:16a-26: de bzhin klu yi dug rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-28: rnam par rtog pa'i dug rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-30: rdzas kyi mthu yi stobs rnams kyis //
T02TD2174E:16a-31: dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig / sngags kyi mthu yi stobs rnams kyis //
T02TD2174E:16a-32: dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig / ye shes mthu yi stobs rnams kyis //
T02TD2174E:16a-33: dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig / dug rnams zhi byed mthu yis ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-34: thams cad byang chub thob par shog / dug zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu pa'o /
T02TD2174E:16a-36: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:16a-37: dgug pa la sogs sbyor ba gzhan yang bstan //
T02TD2174E:16a-38: lha bskyed sbyor ba rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-39: sngags rnams so so'i mtha' la ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-40: dgug pa'i yi ge gdags par bya //
T02TD2174E:16a-41: yang n'a ga r'a dz'a dza dza zhes pas /
T02TD2174E:16a-42: thun mong gi sngags su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:16a-43: sngags kyi yi ge'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:16a-44: gang 'dod gnas nas bkug nas ni //
T02TD2174E:16a-45: shing chen dag gi sdong po la //
T02TD2174E:16a-46: shing gi chol ni phyung nas su /
T02TD2174E:16a-47: gro ga dag la klu gzugs bri //
T02TD2174E:16b-0: 'od zer 'phros pas de la @16b bkug / de nas shing chen nang du gzhug / kha bcad tshon gyi skud pas bcing //
T02TD2174E:16b-1: thal sogs 'dag pas zhal zhal bya //
T02TD2174E:16b-2: yang na pha bong la gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:16b-3: de ltar mi bya bskrad pa ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-4: shing shun la sogs dag la ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-5: rlung ngam sha ba'i gzugs bris la //
T02TD2174E:16b-6: de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i gzugs //
T02TD2174E:16b-7: gang 'dod pas ni bris nas bzhag / rtsa sngags mtha' la bskrad sngags gdags //
T02TD2174E:16b-8: gang ltar 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD2174E:16b-10: gong gi sbyor bas bkug nas su //
T02TD2174E:16b-11: gru gsum nag po'i brub khung du ;
T02TD2174E:16b-12: / nag po'i sbyor bas kha bcad la //
T02TD2174E:16b-13: ri rab gzugs bri mnan par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:16b-14: lha rnams bcu bdun stang stabs kyis //
T02TD2174E:16b-15: ji tsam 'dod par mnan par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:16b-16: gsang bar 'dod pa'i sbyor ka yis //
T02TD2174E:16b-17: gzugs brnyan la sogs gong bzhin bca' //
T02TD2174E:16b-18: bsnyen pa la sogs rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2174E:16b-19: gsang sngags la sogs shes byas la //
T02TD2174E:16b-20: mtshon cha phyag mtshan byin brlabs la //
T02TD2174E:16b-21: khro bo mtshon cha thogs pa yis //
T02TD2174E:16b-22: lus rnams gtub cing gsod bar bsam //
T02TD2174E:16b-24: yang na sngags kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:16b-25: gang 'dod par ni bsreg par bya //
T02TD2174E:16b-26: yang na sbyin sreg dag gis bya //
T02TD2174E:16b-27: dam la ma thogs klu rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-28: sgrub pa po la bar chad byed //
T02TD2174E:16b-29: dang po zhi bas gdul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:16b-30: zhi bas 'dul bar ma gyur na //
T02TD2174E:16b-31: de la drag po'i las rnams brtsam //
T02TD2174E:16b-32: dam la thogs pa'i klu rgyal ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-33: bsten cing bsgrubs na dngos grub ster //
T02TD2174E:16b-34: bde gshegs sbrul ba bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-35: dngos grub mchog kyang ster bar byed //
T02TD2174E:16b-36: klu rgyal de bsgrub sbyor ba yang //
T02TD2174E:16b-37: sngon 'gro cho ga rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:16b-38: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02TD2174E:16b-39: stod pa'i ngang las pad zla'i gdan //
T02TD2174E:16b-40: de steng cho ga gsum gyis bskyed //
T02TD2174E:16b-41: lhag pa'i lha ni gang 'dod bskyed //
T02TD2174E:16b-42: gzhan dag sbrul pa'ang gang 'dod pa yang yod //
T02TD2174E:16b-43: mdun du pad zla'i gdan steng du //
T02TD2174E:16b-44: cho ga gsum mam skad cig sbrul //
T02TD2174E:16b-45: sku mdog dkar po sbrul zhags bsnams //
T02TD2174E:16b-46: klu rgyal de 'dra spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2174E:16b-47: mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:17a-2: klu'i cho ga'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu gcig pa'o /
T02TD2174E:17a-4: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:17a-5: rnal 'byor bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2174E:17a-7: dang po las bzhi'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2174E:17a-8: zhi ba go ro tsa na blang ;
T02TD2174E:17a-9: / gro ga'am smyug ma'i shun pa la //
T02TD2174E:17a-10: rtsa sogs dkar po ma yin spangs //
T02TD2174E:17a-11: zhi ba 'dod pa'i smyu gu yis //
T02TD2174E:17a-12: bsgrub bya sgrub byed 'khor lo bri //
T02TD2174E:17a-14: brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug bri //
T02TD2174E:17a-15: shes rab cho gas yang dag bri //
T02TD2174E:17a-16: yang na gcig dang gnyis su bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-17: sngags ni thams cad dgod pa dang //
T02TD2174E:17a-18: gcig dang gnyis su dgod pa'o //
T02TD2174E:17a-19: yi ge re re dgod pa dang //
T02TD2174E:17a-20: thams cad rdzogs par dgod pa'o //
T02TD2174E:17a-21: shar nas brtsams te bri bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-22: de ma thag tu dor ba yang //
T02TD2174E:17a-23: bsgrub bya'i ming dang n'a ma dang //
T02TD2174E:17a-24: bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa bri //
T02TD2174E:17a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2174E:17a-26: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer las //
T02TD2174E:17a-27: sngon po'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2174E:17a-28: mchod bstod bsnyen pa byas nas su //
T02TD2174E:17a-29: dkyil 'khor nyid la gzhug par bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-30: byin dang ldan pa'i lha nyid ni //
T02TD2174E:17a-31: yi ge'i gzugs las 'phros pas na //
T02TD2174E:17a-32: dkar po don byed brtul zhugs can //
T02TD2174E:17a-33: mar dang sbrang rtsi dbus dkar nas //
T02TD2174E:17a-34: skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-35: me tog dkar pos thun gsum du //
T02TD2174E:17a-36: zhi ba'i sems kyis gtor bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-37: bdag nyid sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2174E:17a-38: bskyed pa'i rim pa gang 'dod bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-39: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po la //
T02TD2174E:17a-40: de yi mdun du bsgrub bya ni //
T02TD2174E:17a-41: padma zla bar gnas pa ste //
T02TD2174E:17a-42: kho dog dkar po zla ba'i mdangs //
T02TD2174E:17a-43: bsgrub bya gnas par mthong nas ni //
T02TD2174E:17a-44: bum pa dkar po'i zla ba'i mdangs //
T02TD2174E:17a-45: bdud rtsi ldas ni bkang ba yis //
T02TD2174E:17a-46: dbang bskur ba ni bsam par bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-47: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa grangs med dbang //
T02TD2174E:17a-48: thob nas bsgrub bya gang yin la //
T02TD2174E:17a-49: bdud rtsi spyi bor blugs par bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-50: bdag nyid sngon po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2174E:17a-51: sngags kyi 'od zer spros pa las //
T02TD2174E:17a-52: bsgrub bya'i mi mthun zhi bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-53: de nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2174E:17a-54: aom na mo n'i l'amba ra dhar badzra p'a ni h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:17b-0: @17b che ge mo zhi bar gyis shig / na ma sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:17b-1: dug ni zhi bar 'dod pa ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-2: gur gum dag gis 'khor lo bri //
T02TD2174E:17b-3: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas //
T02TD2174E:17b-4: nag po'i gcig tu las rnams 'grub //
T02TD2174E:17b-5: de ltar rnal 'byor sgrub pa pas //
T02TD2174E:17b-6: 'khor lo'i man ngag yod pa na //
T02TD2174E:17b-7: the tshom med par byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-8: sngags ni nan tan cher bskyed na //
T02TD2174E:17b-10: zhi ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o /
T02TD2174E:17b-12: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:17b-13: de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi //
T02TD2174E:17b-14: thams cad sngon bzhin byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-15: sngags ni thams cad dgod pa na //
T02TD2174E:17b-16: mi dgod pa ni sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-17: 'khor lo yang ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2174E:17b-18: stong pa'i mtshams ni blangs nas su //
T02TD2174E:17b-19: ming dang bskul tshig sv'a h'a spel //
T02TD2174E:17b-20: gzhi ni gro ga'am ras la bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-21: gur gum kha che skyes la sogs //
T02TD2174E:17b-22: gang 'dod pa yis bri bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-23: kham por ser bor kha sbyar nas //
T02TD2174E:17b-24: skud pa ser pos bcing bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-25: bdag nyid rgyas pa'i lha nyid du //
T02TD2174E:17b-26: bskyed pa la sogs rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-27: yi ge h'um ni ser po yis //
T02TD2174E:17b-28: lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'dra spros nas ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-29: rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-30: sngon bzhin mchod pa la sogs bya ;
T02TD2174E:17b-32: byin dang ldan pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-34: ser po'i byed pa brtul zhugs can //
T02TD2174E:17b-35: mar dang sbrang rtsis snod bkang la //
T02TD2174E:17b-36: skud ba ser pos bcing bar bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-37: me tog ser pos thun gsum du //
T02TD2174E:17b-38: rgyas pa'i sems kyis gtor zhing mchod //
T02TD2174E:17b-39: bdag nyid sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-41: yi ge'i gzugs su mthong byas la //
T02TD2174E:17b-42: bsgrub bya'i mi mthun rgyas byas te //
T02TD2174E:17b-43: me tog ser po dus su mchod //
T02TD2174E:17b-44: lha yi rnal 'byor shes pa yis //
T02TD2174E:17b-45: thams cad rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2174E:17b-46: padma zla ba'i gdan steng du //
T02TD2174E:17b-47: bsgrub bya ser po mdun bsams la //
T02TD2174E:17b-48: gser sogs bum pas dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2174E:17b-49: rgyas pa'i mi mthun skyon rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:17b-50: bkru zhing de nyid rgyas par bsam //
T02TD2174E:17b-51: sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bon las //
T02TD2174E:18a-2: sngags bzlas skyon rnams sbyang bar bsam //
T02TD2174E:18a-3: aom na mo n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um che ge mo rgyas par gyis shig sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:18a-4: rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag bstan //
T02TD2174E:18a-5: nya dang de bzhin rgyas pa'i nya //
T02TD2174E:18a-6: de yi dus su yang dag sbyar //
T02TD2174E:18a-7: rgyas pa'i las ni 'di dag la //
T02TD2174E:18a-8: rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:18a-9: rgyas pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu gsum pa'o /
T02TD2174E:18a-11: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:18a-13: gr'a ba dmar po'i rdzas rnams la //
T02TD2174E:18a-14: 'khor lo gnyis ni sngon bzhin bri //
T02TD2174E:18a-15: sngags sogs dgod pa sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-16: bsnyen pa yang ni sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-18: srin lag khrag gis bri bar bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-19: kham pho nag po la sogs min //
T02TD2174E:18a-20: kha sbyar 'khor lo gzhug par bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-21: sbrang rtsi mar gyis bkang nas su //
T02TD2174E:18a-22: skud pa dmar gyis bcing bar bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-23: lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02TD2174E:18a-25: de nas 'khor lo dag la bstim //
T02TD2174E:18a-26: dbang du byed pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2174E:18a-27: sngags kyi gnas su nus mthu can //
T02TD2174E:18a-28: 'od zer dmar po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2174E:18a-29: bsgrub bya dbang du bya bar bsam //
T02TD2174E:18a-30: me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod //
T02TD2174E:18a-31: cho ga las bskyed rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2174E:18a-32: dmar po kha dog dbang du byed //
T02TD2174E:18a-33: nub phyogs ngos su kha bltas la //
T02TD2174E:18a-34: zla ba dmar po dag la ni //
T02TD2174E:18a-35: bsgrub bya bsam par byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:18a-36: snying ga'i yi ge'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:18a-37: bsgrub bya gnas nas bkug bsams la //
T02TD2174E:18a-38: khri yi sngags ni bzlas par bya //
T02TD2174E:18a-39: bsgrub bya'i lus la phog gyur pas //
T02TD2174E:18a-40: de yi sems ni yengs gyur nas //
T02TD2174E:18a-41: zhabs kyi drung du 'gyel bar bsam //
T02TD2174E:18a-42: skra grol ba la gos med pa //
T02TD2174E:18a-43: shin tu g-yeng ba'i bsgrub bya bsam //
T02TD2174E:18a-44: dbang du mi 'gyur gang yang med //
T02TD2174E:18a-45: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ma h'a tsanda ro sha na h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:18a-46: che ge mo dbang du bgyis pas ma ya ho //
T02TD2174E:18a-47: gang dag dbang du mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2174E:18b-0: kha ti ma yi me ni du ba @18b med ;
T02TD2174E:18b-2: las su bya ba dus bstan pa //
T02TD2174E:18b-3: nag po'i brgyad nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2174E:18b-4: de bzhin nag po'i brgyad kyi bar //
T02TD2174E:18b-5: brtul zhugs can gyis dbang la sbyor //
T02TD2174E:18b-7: rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:18b-8: dbang gi 'khrul 'khor gyi spyor ka ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
T02TD2174E:18b-10: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:18b-11: drag po yi ni 'khrul 'khor dag / dur khrod dag gi ras ma la //
T02TD2174E:18b-12: ske tshe ni ma pa'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2174E:18b-13: tsha ba gsum gyi mar dang dur khrod gsol //
T02TD2174E:18b-14: da du ra dang gtum po'i sa bon dang //
T02TD2174E:18b-15: khro mdzub khrag dang tsi ta khu ba dang //
T02TD2174E:18b-16: byi brun gyi ni 'jim pa blang //
T02TD2174E:18b-17: gtum byed kyi ni phrul ba'i chus //
T02TD2174E:18b-18: ltogs chen sgro yi smyu gu yis //
T02TD2174E:18b-19: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02TD2174E:18b-20: gtum bo khros pa'i sa bon gyis //
T02TD2174E:18b-21: brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bri //
T02TD2174E:18b-22: bcu yi nyi ma phyed na bri //
T02TD2174E:18b-23: sngags la sogs pa dgod pa ni //
T02TD2174E:18b-24: sngon du gsungs pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02TD2174E:18b-25: de nas stong pa'i le'u tshe rnams //
T02TD2174E:18b-26: ming dang bskul tshig h'um phat ldan //
T02TD2174E:18b-27: rnal 'byor khros pa'i gzugs can gyis //
T02TD2174E:18b-28: 'od zer 'phros pas lha rnams dgug / cho ga la sogs byas pa la //
T02TD2174E:18b-29: de nas bkug ste 'khor lor gzhug / gsod dang ldan pa'i khro bo ni //
T02TD2174E:18b-30: nus dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams //
T02TD2174E:18b-31: gdug pa'i chogs kyis gsad par bya //
T02TD2174E:18b-32: de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD2174E:18b-33: byi brun 'jim pa gtum byed chus //
T02TD2174E:18b-34: kham phon sbyar zhing dgang bar bya //
T02TD2174E:18b-35: me tog nag pos dus gsum mchod //
T02TD2174E:18b-36: bdag nyid khros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2174E:18b-37: lho phyogs kha bltas bsgrub bya mdun //
T02TD2174E:18b-38: 'brub khung la sogs man ngag rdzogs //
T02TD2174E:18b-39: gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2174E:18b-40: gsod pa'i man ngag la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:18b-41: gnas der bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD2174E:18b-42: rgyal rigs thod pa'am gzhan yang rung //
T02TD2174E:18b-43: nang gi 'bru dang sman dag dang //
T02TD2174E:18b-44: gling rta mi khrag thod pa bkang //
T02TD2174E:19a-0: @19a * // bkang ste thod pa gsum skyed bzhag / dur khrod dag gi ro shing bskul //
T02TD2174E:19a-1: khros pa'i me yis bskul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-2: dur khrod ras mar bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs bri //
T02TD2174E:19a-3: steng gi thod pa bcug ste bzhag / thod pa kha sbub thal ba phyogs su gtor //
T02TD2174E:19a-5: yang na gzhan sogs sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2174E:19a-6: mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-7: aom n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2174E:19a-8: de ba datta m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:19a-9: drag po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu lnga pa'o /
T02TD2174E:19a-11: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:19a-13: dur khrod ras ma khru gang la //
T02TD2174E:19a-14: sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis //
T02TD2174E:19a-15: 'khor lo'i sngags sogs sngon bzhin bri //
T02TD2174E:19a-16: stong pa'i le'u tshe blangs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:19a-17: gang ming bskul ba'i sngags dang ldan //
T02TD2174E:19a-18: bdag nyid lha yi sbyor sogs ldan //
T02TD2174E:19a-20: gsol bstod byas nas bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-21: khri ni thos nas nag po'i phyogs //
T02TD2174E:19a-22: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bzhi la /
T02TD2174E:19a-23: gsol ba btab ste bstod pa bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-24: them ba'am rgya gram lam dus pa //
T02TD2174E:19a-25: bsgrub bya ji srid mnan pa ru //
T02TD2174E:19a-27: gtor ma byin nas skrod cig ces //
T02TD2174E:19a-28: gsol ba mang du gdab par bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-29: khros pas nub byang kha bltas te //
T02TD2174E:19a-32: aom n'i l'a mba ra dha ra badzra b'a ni ma h'a ya ksha se n'a ba ta ye h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2174E:19a-33: de ba datta che ge mo skrod cig datt'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2174E:19a-34: sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di yis ni //
T02TD2174E:19a-35: nges par gnas nas skrod par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:19a-36: skrod pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu drug pa'o /
T02TD2174E:19a-38: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:19a-40: gong du bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyis //
T02TD2174E:19a-41: 'khor lo bris nas cho ga bya //
T02TD2174E:19a-42: bzlas pa khri ni them nas ni //
T02TD2174E:19a-43: bri ti ka ye shing la gdags //
T02TD2174E:19a-44: mi yi rje ngar bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD2174E:19a-45: dri chen dag gis thod pa dgang //
T02TD2174E:19a-46: ming dang bskul ba'i sngags ldan pa //
T02TD2174E:19a-47: 'bum tsho bzhi ni thon pa dang //
T02TD2174E:19b-0: shing gi gong ma @19b dag la gdags //
T02TD2174E:19b-2: yang na skad cig tsam gyis 'gugs //
T02TD2174E:19b-3: aom n'i l'ambara dha ra ma h'a ya ksha se na' pa ta ye badzra p'a ni ye h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD2174E:19b-4: de ba ratta m'a ra ya h'um che ge mo dza:/
T02TD2174E:19b-5: zhes bya ba yi snags kyis na //
T02TD2174E:19b-7: 'gugs pa ka sogs pa'i pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu bdun pa'o /
T02TD2174E:19b-9: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:19b-10: lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:19b-11: rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal ba'i //
T02TD2174E:19b-12: mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2174E:19b-13: rnal 'byor bla dman don du ni //
T02TD2174E:19b-14: yang nas yang du gsol btab pas //
T02TD2174E:19b-15: yid ches brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2174E:19b-16: man ngag rim pa bstan pa la //
T02TD2174E:19b-17: bla ma las ni gsan bar gyis //
T02TD2174E:19b-18: gsang sngags sgo ni dpag med nas //
T02TD2174E:19b-19: thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa //
T02TD2174E:19b-20: sems can las ni sna tshogs pas //
T02TD2174E:19b-21: so so'i mos pa mi mthun phyir //
T02TD2174E:19b-22: dper na sman rnams nus pa yis //
T02TD2174E:19b-23: nad rnams so sor sel ba bzhin //
T02TD2174E:19b-24: man ngag thabs rnams so sos kyang //
T02TD2174E:19b-25: dug gi nad rnams 'joms par byed //
T02TD2174E:19b-26: dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang //
T02TD2174E:19b-27: phrad pa tsam gyis nad 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2174E:19b-31: de dag kun gyis ma choms pa //
T02TD2174E:19b-32: sbyor ba gzhan sogs 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2174E:19b-33: gzhan po kho nas 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2174E:19b-34: sman dang sbyor ba de dag kyang //
T02TD2174E:19b-36: mi mkhas pa yis gnod par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:19b-37: sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2174E:19b-38: brtson 'grus nan tan ma byas na //
T02TD2174E:19b-40: de bzhin mthun pa'i dpe rnams ni //
