T02TD2174E:22b-43: de yang brtag pa'i cho ga yang //
T02TD2174E:22b-44: zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu //
T02TD2174E:22b-45: re dogs la sogs thams cad kun //
T02TD2174E:22b-47: nan tan du ni brtson 'grub bya //
T02TD2174E:22b-48: tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang //
T02TD2174E:22b-49: byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu //
T02TD2174E:22b-50: byed cing phyag rgya sogs ston pas //
T02TD2174E:22b-51: ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang //
T02TD2174E:23a-2: gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs //
T02TD2174E:23a-3: thams cad brten zhing mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2174E:23a-4: lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:23a-5: de las bzlog pa thams cad kun //
T02TD2174E:23a-6: bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:23a-7: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
T02TD2174E:23a-8: mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na //
T02TD2174E:23a-9: 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus //
T02TD2174E:23a-10: bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams //
T02TD2174E:23a-11: sgrub pa nyams su len pa la //
T02TD2174E:23a-12: bstan cing spel na bsod nams 'phel //
T02TD2174E:23a-13: nyams su mi len ser sna can //
T02TD2174E:23a-14: rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:23a-15: bla ma la ni 'bul mi nus //
T02TD2174E:23a-16: de la man ngag bstan mi bya //
T02TD2174E:23a-17: de la man ngag bstan pa na //
T02TD2174E:23a-18: dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel //
T02TD2174E:23a-19: dam tshig nyams te mkha' 'gros gsod //
T02TD2174E:23a-20: cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po //
T02TD2174E:23a-21: ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02TD2174E:23a-22: sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2174E:23a-23: rna ba brgyud pa'i man ngag de //
T02TD2174E:23a-24: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan //
T02TD2174E:23a-25: des ni ro langs ma la bstan //
T02TD2174E:23a-26: gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD2174E:23a-27: slob dpon phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2174E:23a-28: brgyud pa'i man ngag rim pa rnams //
T02TD2174E:23a-29: nan tan gyis ni btsa' bar bya //
T02TD2174E:23a-30: de la btsa' ba ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:23a-31: dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni ;
T02TD2174E:23a-32: / klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni //
T02TD2174E:23a-33: 'dam rdzab nang du stor ba bzhin //
T02TD2174E:23a-34: de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di //
T02TD2174E:23a-35: lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi //
T02TD2174E:23a-36: sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas //
T02TD2174E:23a-37: dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na //
T02TD2174E:23a-38: dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:23a-39: de bas nan tan bskyed de btsa' //
T02TD2174E:23a-40: lung bstan pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
T02TD2174E:23a-42: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:23a-43: de nas sems can rtsod ldan gyi //
T02TD2174E:23a-44: dus su rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2174E:23a-45: dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung pas //
T02TD2174E:23a-46: yo byad rdzas chud sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2174E:23a-47: nyams pa 'phel du mi gzhug phyir //
T02TD2174E:23a-48: mandala cho gas bskang ba ni //
T02TD2174E:23a-50: shin tu gus pas mandala bca' //
T02TD2174E:23a-51: mandala bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa //
T02TD2174E:23a-52: sa gzhi shin tu mnyen pa la //
T02TD2174E:23a-53: skyon spangs yon tan ldan pa yi //
T02TD2174E:23a-54: mandala lnga ni bca' bya ste //
T02TD2174E:23b-0: @23b dang po mandala dkar po bca' //
T02TD2174E:23b-1: gnyis pa sngon po dag tu bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-2: gsum pa mthing ga dag tu bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-3: bzhi pa ser po dag tu bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-4: lnga pa dmar po dag tu bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-5: dkar rtsi dang ni ba bla dang //
T02TD2174E:23b-6: yang na rtsva sngon me tog gis //
T02TD2174E:23b-7: gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-8: mtshal la sogs pa'i rigs dang ni ;
T02TD2174E:23b-9: / gur gum la sogs rigs dag dang //
T02TD2174E:23b-10: sbyar ba'i nag po'i rigs dag gis //
T02TD2174E:23b-11: kha dog bsgyur bar bstan pa yin //
T02TD2174E:23b-12: yang na thams cad dkar dang sngo //
T02TD2174E:23b-13: de gnyis gcig gis bya ba yin //
T02TD2174E:23b-14: bsdus rgyas mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-15: ba yi rnam pa lnga dang ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-16: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dag ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-17: dngos grub can gyi snod du gzhag / rin chen bum pa la sogs kyi //
T02TD2174E:23b-18: skyon spangs yon tan ldan pa yi //
T02TD2174E:23b-19: snod du thun mong khyad par rdzas //
T02TD2174E:23b-20: tsandan med du mi rung ngo //
T02TD2174E:23b-21: kha rgyan 'bras bu can gyis bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-22: dang por bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2174E:23b-23: tha mal 'du shes spangs nas ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-24: lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis //
T02TD2174E:23b-25: dang po bum pa byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2174E:23b-26: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gdab //
T02TD2174E:23b-27: aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um /
T02TD2174E:23b-28: nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun du gdab //
T02TD2174E:23b-29: gong gi bkra shis snod kyi rdzas //
T02TD2174E:23b-30: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas btab nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:23b-31: dang po bum pa'i chus su bsang //
T02TD2174E:23b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyang bzlas //
T02TD2174E:23b-33: thugs ka'i aa las zla ba yi //
T02TD2174E:23b-34: dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du bsam //
T02TD2174E:23b-36: bdun dang lnga dang gsum du bzlas //
T02TD2174E:23b-37: tsandan las kyi bum pas bsang //
T02TD2174E:23b-38: yi ge du 'phros tsandan phog / de las 'phros pas mandala gang //
T02TD2174E:23b-39: aom dh'um pa spha ra na h'um /
T02TD2174E:23b-40: zhes pas lan bdun bzlas so //
T02TD2174E:23b-41: me tog lnga dang gnyis gcig la //
T02TD2174E:23b-42: kha dog mtshan nyid shes byas la //
T02TD2174E:23b-43: yi ge pam las padma ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-44: stong ldan brgyad ldan dag tu ni //
T02TD2174E:23b-45: gyur par bsams nas sngags bzlas dgram //
T02TD2174E:23b-47: zhes gong ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:23b-48: de steng bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2174E:23b-49: lnga dang gnyis dang gcig tu bya //
T02TD2174E:23b-50: de nas thams cad kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:23b-51: gsum du bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod //
T02TD2174E:23b-52: zla ba padma gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2174E:23b-53: gsum dang gnyis dang gcig tu yang //
T02TD2174E:23b-54: rnal 'byor bsdus dang rgyas pa ni//
T02TD2174E:24a-0: @24a * // nyams pa che chung go rims so //
T02TD2174E:24a-1: de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid dang //
T02TD2174E:24a-2: dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor kun //
T02TD2174E:24a-3: khrus byas gos ni bzang po gon //
T02TD2174E:24a-4: rgyan cha la sogs mdzes par byas //
T02TD2174E:24a-5: shar ram nub tu kha bltas te //
T02TD2174E:24a-6: so so lha yi ting 'dzin bskyed //
T02TD2174E:24a-7: rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2174E:24a-8: rdo rje dril bus bskul nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:24a-9: tshigs bcad dag gis gsol ba btab //
T02TD2174E:24a-10: sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' la gdags //
T02TD2174E:24a-11: thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2174E:24a-12: yi ge bzhi 'phros lha mor gyur //
T02TD2174E:24a-13: bla ma yi dam lha dang ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-14: gsang sngags bdag po dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD2174E:24a-15: dkon mchog gsum sogs spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2174E:24a-16: bla ma sbyangs nas mi bskyod 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:24a-17: mchod yon mchod sogs rgyas par dbul //
T02TD2174E:24a-18: de yi sngon du phyag rnams bya //
T02TD2174E:24a-19: gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD2174E:24a-20: mchod nas bstod pa rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:24a-21: de nas sngags bzlas 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:24a-22: lha rnams la ni phog nas su //
T02TD2174E:24a-24: nyams pa'i lus la phog nas su //
T02TD2174E:24a-25: ba spu'i khung zhugs sdig pa bsdus //
T02TD2174E:24a-26: snying gar yi ge kam ngam ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-27: 'od nag tu ni gyur par bsam //
T02TD2174E:24a-28: srog go 'dus kyi sna nas byung //
T02TD2174E:24a-29: lha dang bdag gi bar du ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-30: padma nag po'i gdan bsams la //
T02TD2174E:24a-31: sdig pa'i gzugs de de ru bzhag / de nas yi dam lha yi sngags //
T02TD2174E:24a-33: sdig pa rnams ni sbyangs bar bya //
T02TD2174E:24a-34: yang na sdig pa de nyid sbyangs nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:24a-35: lus kyi lhag ma sbyang ba'am //
T02TD2174E:24a-36: de nas yi ge brgya pa yis //
T02TD2174E:24a-37: man ngag bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2174E:24a-38: snga ma bzhin du sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2174E:24a-39: yang na yi ge brgya pa gcig pus bya //
T02TD2174E:24a-40: yi ge brgya pa 'bum dang ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-41: rang gi snying po 'bum gyis ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-42: rtsa ba nyams pa chen po skongs //
T02TD2174E:24a-43: sum cha phri bas gnyis pa skongs //
T02TD2174E:24a-44: phyed phri bas ni gsum pa skongs //
T02TD2174E:24a-45: sum gnyis phri bas bzhi pa skongs //
T02TD2174E:24a-46: sum cha'i sum cha phri bas ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-47: lnga pa skongs te drug pa ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-48: sum gnyis phri bas skongs pa'o //
T02TD2174E:24a-49: de yi phyed phyed phri bas ni //
T02TD2174E:24a-50: tha ma gsum gyis go rims sbyor //
T02TD2174E:24b-0: yan lag brgyad dang brgya @24b phyed dang //
T02TD2174E:24b-1: nyi shu rtsa gcig dag gis so //
T02TD2174E:24b-2: che chung rim pa dag gis ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-3: tha ma me'am chu yi ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-4: sbyin sreg dag gis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-5: gsang sngags bdag gam bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02TD2174E:24b-6: rta mgrin bum pa gong bzhin bcas //
T02TD2174E:24b-7: byin brlabs la sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-8: tha ma dag par bkru ba'o //
T02TD2174E:24b-9: sbyin sreg khrus dang ldan pa'am //
T02TD2174E:24b-10: yang na mandala bzlas pa yi //
T02TD2174E:24b-11: cho ga gcig pus byar yang rung //
T02TD2174E:24b-12: dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba yi //
T02TD2174E:24b-13: sbyor ka 'di la brtson par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:24b-14: dam tshig nyams pa bskang pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu dgu pa'o /
T02TD2174E:24b-16: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:24b-17: dbang gi rim pa bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-18: bum pa gsang ba ye shes dang //
T02TD2174E:24b-19: bzhi par bstan pa de rnams la //
T02TD2174E:24b-20: gnas ni yid 'ongs la sogs su //
T02TD2174E:24b-21: dus la sogs pa 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2174E:24b-22: slob dpon slob ma mtshan nyid ldan //
T02TD2174E:24b-23: sngon gyi gling gzhi rjes mthun par ;
T02TD2174E:24b-24: / dkyil 'khor byas nas slob ma gzhug / dbang bskur rim pa mnor bar //
T02TD2174E:24b-25: rnam grangs rnams ni shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-26: bskur thabs man ngag shes byas la //
T02TD2174E:24b-27: bskur ba'i gnas kyang ma nor brtag / de ltar byas pas sgrib pa 'byang //
T02TD2174E:24b-28: sa yang rim gyis non par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:24b-29: de phyir man ngag bstan par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-30: rtags la sogs pa'ang shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-31: brda mi shes na sngags pa min //
T02TD2174E:24b-32: las dang po yis rdzas la brten //
T02TD2174E:24b-33: dgos pa shes na the tshom med //
T02TD2174E:24b-34: nus pa mthu dang ldan pas ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-36: de dag spyi dang khyad par ni //
T02TD2174E:24b-37: cho ga man ngag rgyas pa rnams //
T02TD2174E:24b-38: rgyun 'grel kun na gsal bas na //
T02TD2174E:24b-39: 'di ru bdag gis mdo tsam bsdus //
T02TD2174E:24b-40: bum pa'i dbang ni rnam bzhi ste //
T02TD2174E:24b-41: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
T02TD2174E:24b-42: mthar thug pa ru shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-43: phyi ni phyi rgyud dag dang mthun //
T02TD2174E:24b-44: nang ni nang rgyud dag dang mthun //
T02TD2174E:24b-45: yang na gnyis ka phyi ru bstan //
T02TD2174E:24b-46: nang gi slob dpon lus la gzhag / gsang ba yul ni nyid la sbyar //
T02TD2174E:24b-47: mthar thug slob ma mgo bo ru //
T02TD2174E:24b-48: dga' ba bskyed pa'am rdo rje'i rtsa //
T02TD2174E:24b-49: de rnams man ngag rgyas bshad pa //
T02TD2174E:24b-50: las kyi phreng bar shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:24b-51: gsang ba dbang la bzhi ru bstan //
T02TD2174E:25a-2: yang na mtshan ldan phab nas ni //
T02TD2174E:25a-3: srin mtheb dag gis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-4: nang gi gsang ba pho brang nas //
T02TD2174E:25a-5: lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas sbyin //
T02TD2174E:25a-6: gsang ba yum gyi mkha' nas blangs //
T02TD2174E:25a-7: mthar thug gsang ba'i pho brang du //
T02TD2174E:25a-8: mchog dga' skyes par shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-9: shes rab ye shes la yang bzhi //
T02TD2174E:25a-10: phyi ni las kyi phyag rgya ma //
T02TD2174E:25a-11: nang ni 'od kyi rig ma yin //
T02TD2174E:25a-12: gsang ba bya gdong ma la bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-13: mthar thug dregs 'dzin gtum mo yin //
T02TD2174E:25a-14: mthar thug la ni gnyis su bstan //
T02TD2174E:25a-15: rten bcas dang ni rten med do //
T02TD2174E:25a-16: rten med la yang gnyis su bstan //
T02TD2174E:25a-17: spros bcas dang ni spros med do //
T02TD2174E:25a-18: dbang gi man ngag rgyas bshad pa //
T02TD2174E:25a-19: slob dpon zhal gyi man ngag dang //
T02TD2174E:25a-20: las kyi phreng bar shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-21: brda yi cho ga mdo tsam bstan //
T02TD2174E:25a-22: ka la sha aa bhi she ka zhes pa ni //
T02TD2174E:25a-23: bum pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda //
T02TD2174E:25a-24: lag pa'i sor mo bkang nas ni ;
T02TD2174E:25a-25: / rtse mo bsdus pa'i bum pa'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:25a-26: gu hya aa bhi she ka zhes pa //
T02TD2174E:25a-27: gsang pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda //
T02TD2174E:25a-28: sdom pos khro mo gnon pa ni //
T02TD2174E:25a-29: lag brda'i 'dri na shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-30: pradzny'a dzny'a na gu hya aa bhi she ka zhes pa ni //
T02TD2174E:25a-31: shes rab ye shes ngag gi brda //
T02TD2174E:25a-32: lus kyi brda ni lha sbyin brda //
T02TD2174E:25a-33: yang na khyad par dga' ba mtshon //
T02TD2174E:25a-34: pra dzny'a dzny'a gu hya aa bhi she ka zhes pa //
T02TD2174E:25a-35: bzhi pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda //
T02TD2174E:25a-36: lhan cig dga' ba skyes sa ru //
T02TD2174E:25a-37: mthe bo bcu gnas mtshon par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:25a-38: de ltar brda rnams ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:25a-39: mkha' 'gro dngos grub ster ba na //
T02TD2174E:25a-40: brda rnams dris nas ster bar byed //
T02TD2174E:25a-41: brda rnams dri shes slar la 'tshor //
T02TD2174E:25a-42: yang na brda rnams gzhan po yang //
T02TD2174E:25a-43: ma shes na ni mkha' 'gros gsod //
T02TD2174E:25a-44: brda la sogs pa ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:25a-45: gsang sngags spyod pa'i dus dang ni //
T02TD2174E:25a-46: 'byung po nyams gsod gsol ba dang //
T02TD2174E:25a-48: phyag dang phyag gi lan dus su //
T02TD2174E:25a-49: brda mi shes na sngags pa min //
T02TD2174E:25a-50: dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang //
T02TD2174E:25a-51: chags lam grol lam gnyis shes bya'o //
T02TD2174E:25a-52: dbang bskur med na 'bras bu med //
T02TD2174E:25a-53: de bas dbang bskur nan tan bya //
T02TD2174E:25a-54: dbang gi sbyor ka ste sum cu pa'o /
T02TD2174E:25b-0: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag @25b 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:25b-1: dam tshig rnams ni cung zhig bstan //
T02TD2174E:25b-2: dang po spyod pa'i dam tshig ni //
T02TD2174E:25b-3: chags lam spyod lam grol lam spyod //
T02TD2174E:25b-4: de ltar gnyis ka spyod pa la //
T02TD2174E:25b-5: dang po mchog dang rab mchog go //
T02TD2174E:25b-6: de la yang ni phyi nang ngo //
T02TD2174E:25b-7: dang po phyi yi spyod dus su //
T02TD2174E:25b-8: yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs kyis ;
T02TD2174E:25b-10: mthun 'jug spyod pa mkhas shing zab //
T02TD2174E:25b-11: zas dang gos sogs thams cad kyang //
T02TD2174E:25b-12: rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la //
T02TD2174E:25b-14: phan sems med pa nyon mongs can //
T02TD2174E:25b-15: bdag gzhan lha dang snying rje spangs//
T02TD2174E:25b-16: 'gro don mchod pa spangs pas na //
T02TD2174E:25b-17: dam tshig nyams te ngan 'gror ltung //
T02TD2174E:25b-18: nang spyod du ni bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:25b-19: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa la //
T02TD2174E:25b-20: chags pa'i lam pas 'jug par bya //
T02TD2174E:25b-21: grol ba'i lam pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2174E:25b-22: de ltar byin brlabs bdud rtsi ba lta //
T02TD2174E:25b-23: thams cad lha bsgoms mchod byas na //
T02TD2174E:25b-24: bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:25b-25: khyi phag spyod pa bzhin byas na //
T02TD2174E:25b-26: dam tshig nyams te yi dgas sa //
T02TD2174E:25b-27: chang ni bdud rtsi chen po ste //
T02TD2174E:25b-28: btung bar bya ba kho na yin //
T02TD2174E:25b-29: zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2174E:25b-30: mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod mchog tu //
T02TD2174E:25b-31: rul sogs skyon rnams spangs pa yi //
T02TD2174E:25b-32: bdud rtsi ro ldan snod bkang ste //
T02TD2174E:25b-33: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2174E:25b-34: aa las ka p'a la ni bskyed //
T02TD2174E:25b-35: zla ba dang ni de yis bskyed //
T02TD2174E:25b-36: has ni gzugs sogs rnam rtog sbyangs //
T02TD2174E:25b-37: hr'i:sa ni ro sogs rnam rtog sbyangs //
T02TD2174E:25b-38: ho: sa ni bdud rtsi chen por bzhu ;
T02TD2174E:25b-39: / mthe bong h'um las sa gzhi'i tshul //
T02TD2174E:25b-40: srin mtheb sum las ri rab tshul //
T02TD2174E:25b-41: bar nas mam 'phros bdud rtsi bkug / bdag gzhan lha ni mchod byas pas //
T02TD2174E:25b-42: bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:25b-43: de ltar ma byas glang chen bzhin //
T02TD2174E:25b-44: chags shid brkam sogs myos 'thung na //
T02TD2174E:25b-45: skye ba lnga brgyar smyon par skye //
T02TD2174E:25b-46: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2174E:25b-47: yang na rigs lnga'i sbyor sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:25b-48: yang na m'a ma k'i yis sbyangs //
T02TD2174E:25b-49: yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:25b-50: mtshan ldan snod dang chos 'byung dang //
T02TD2174E:26a-0: zla ba la sogs bsams byas @26a * //
T02TD2174E:26a-2: / mchod par bya ba'am yang na bdun //
T02TD2174E:26a-3: spyi gtsug bla ma gzhag byas la //
T02TD2174E:26a-4: sku gsung thugs ni gnas gsum gzhag / de nas 'thor zhing mchod pa yis //
T02TD2174E:26a-5: phyag rgya sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:26a-6: so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la aa mri ta kunda li zhes pa'am //
T02TD2174E:26a-7: aa mri ta kh'a hi zhes pa gang yang rung //
T02TD2174E:26a-8: gsum gsum kun la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:26a-9: de nas rang snying lha gsal la //
T02TD2174E:26a-10: ci rang gnod pa med tsam btung //
T02TD2174E:26a-11: nang la gnod par gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-12: thigs pa gsum ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2174E:26a-13: grol bas kyang ni mchod pa yi //
T02TD2174E:26a-14: dus su btung bar bya phyir ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-15: yul dus gnas skabs sbyar te btung //
T02TD2174E:26a-16: btung ba la sogs gzhan po yang //
T02TD2174E:26a-17: bdud rtsi ma byas 'thung byed pa //
T02TD2174E:26a-18: yi dags gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:26a-19: gsad pa'i spyod pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-20: phyag rgya ma ni bsten pa yang //
T02TD2174E:26a-21: rnal 'byor chags pa'i lam pas ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-22: rtags ldan mtshan nyid la sogs ldan //
T02TD2174E:26a-23: de ltar bsten pa'i gnas skabs ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-24: dbang bskur rnam gnyis dus dang ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-25: mchod pa'i dus dang ting 'dzin ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-26: ye shes skye ba bogs dbyung phyir //
T02TD2174E:26a-27: dam tshig tu ni bstan pa yin //
T02TD2174E:26a-28: yang na bskyed rim bstan pa dang //
T02TD2174E:26a-29: rlung rnams las su rung 'gyur na //
T02TD2174E:26a-30: phyag rgya'i dngos grub myur 'dod phyir //
T02TD2174E:26a-31: phyag rgya la ni brten par bya //
T02TD2174E:26a-32: rnal 'byor grol ba'i lam pas ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-33: yid kyi lha mo gzugs mdzes ma //
T02TD2174E:26a-34: mchod pa'i dus su dam tshig go //
T02TD2174E:26a-35: de nas mkha' 'gro lung ston dus //
T02TD2174E:26a-36: dngos grub myur du thob 'dod na //
T02TD2174E:26a-37: mkha' 'gro'i man ngag la brten no //
T02TD2174E:26a-38: de ltar go rims ma shes na //
T02TD2174E:26a-39: dam tshig nyams te srin bur skye //
T02TD2174E:26a-40: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa la //
T02TD2174E:26a-42: mi rtsom pa ni dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2174E:26a-43: mi shes gnod pa mi byed la //
T02TD2174E:26a-44: byed na yang ni dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2174E:26a-45: de sogs sbyor ba gzhan po yang //
T02TD2174E:26a-46: man ngag gis ni shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:26a-47: mchog gi spyod pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD2174E:26a-48: brtul zhugs smyon pa lkugs pa dang //
T02TD2174E:26a-49: gcer bu la sogs dus skabs sbyar //
T02TD2174E:26a-50: de ltar ma shes dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2174E:26b-0: rab mchog gi ni @26b dus dag tu //
T02TD2174E:26b-1: don dam rang bzhin med pa'am //
T02TD2174E:26b-2: sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas //
T02TD2174E:26b-3: rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dus su ni //
T02TD2174E:26b-4: spyod pa la sogs byed pa ni //
T02TD2174E:26b-5: dam tshig nyams te bogs chung ngo //
T02TD2174E:26b-7: lta ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:26b-8: chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste //
T02TD2174E:26b-9: sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med //
T02TD2174E:26b-10: chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems //
T02TD2174E:26b-11: sems nyid de yang skye med phyir //
T02TD2174E:26b-13: bsam du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2174E:26b-14: dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin no //
T02TD2174E:26b-15: lta spyod kyi dam tshig gi sbyor ka ste sum cu gcig pa'o /
T02TD2174E:26b-17: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:26b-18: rab gnas cho ga bstan par bya //
T02TD2174E:26b-19: sku gzugs la sogs kun la ni //
T02TD2174E:26b-20: rab tu gnas pa ma byas na //
T02TD2174E:26b-21: mu stegs lha rten bcas dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2174E:26b-22: rigs dang na tshod med pa'i mi //
T02TD2174E:26b-23: thams cad kun gyis bkur mi byed //
T02TD2174E:26b-24: de bzhin 'dir yang sku sogs la //
T02TD2174E:26b-25: phyag la sogs pa byas gyur kyang //
T02TD2174E:26b-26: bsod nams chen po thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:26b-27: bsod nams chen po thob 'dod na //
T02TD2174E:26b-28: rab gnas byas pas thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:26b-29: de bas rab gnas bya ba gces //
T02TD2174E:26b-30: slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa yis //
T02TD2174E:26b-31: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni //
T02TD2174E:26b-32: so so rang rang bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD2174E:26b-34: sh'akya thub bsnyen pa kun gyi ma //
T02TD2174E:26b-35: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bsnyen pa yis //
T02TD2174E:26b-36: gsang sngags thun mong bstan pa yin //
T02TD2174E:26b-37: bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:26b-38: de nas sa chog la sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:26b-39: gzhan dang mthun par rgyas par bya //
T02TD2174E:26b-40: mandala byi dor legs byas la //
T02TD2174E:26b-41: rgyan dang rol mo la sogs dgram //
T02TD2174E:26b-42: lha yi sta gon rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:26b-43: de nas bum pa'i sta gon bya //
T02TD2174E:26b-44: mandala ma tog gcal bkram la //
T02TD2174E:26b-45: bdag nyid lha ru bsgoms nas su //
T02TD2174E:26b-46: yungs kar ni ma pa lag gnyis kyis //
T02TD2174E:26b-47: 'bangs nas gsum gsum mer bstabs bya //
T02TD2174E:26b-48: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra ya //
T02TD2174E:26b-49: sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2174E:26b-50: chu snyim pa bkad ba lan gsum blugs la //
T02TD2174E:26b-51: bla mas zan chu bsre snod thogs //
T02TD2174E:27a-2: phyi rol dag tu bskal bar bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-3: nam mkha' lha bkang spos thogs nas //
T02TD2174E:27a-4: dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2174E:27a-5: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:27a-6: zhes tshigs bcad la sogs bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:27a-7: de nas mandala steng du ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-8: sku gdung la sogs gzhag byas la //
T02TD2174E:27a-9: slob dpon nub tu gnas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-10: aom h'um bam aa zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2174E:27a-11: ba yi rnam lnga gang yin pa //
T02TD2174E:27a-12: de ni mar chu sbyar ba dang //
T02TD2174E:27a-13: dri zhim tsandan chu nyid dang //
T02TD2174E:27a-14: 'dag chal shing shun chu gsum ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-15: byin brlabs d'ur bas rim bzhin bsku //
T02TD2174E:27a-17: tsa ba le ke na dang ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-18: aa shvad byang chub shing gang rnyed //
T02TD2174E:27a-19: zhib btags chu sbyar snod g-yas gzhag / de nas khrus rnams rim par bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-20: de la sogs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2174E:27a-21: sku gzugs sta gon gnas par bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-23: de rjes rab gnas brtsam par bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-24: sku rnams so so'i sa bon las //
T02TD2174E:27a-25: cho ga gsum sogs gang 'dod bskyed //
T02TD2174E:27a-26: ye shes lha yang so sor bstim //
T02TD2174E:27a-27: sku gdung brtan par bskyed cing bstim //
T02TD2174E:27a-28: glegs bam so so'i snying po la //
T02TD2174E:27a-29: yang na a'a li k'a li'am //
T02TD2174E:27a-30: so so'i dkyil 'khor dag kyang rung //
T02TD2174E:27a-31: lha khang la sogs kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:27a-33: yang na yi ge bh'r'um ni rten yin la //
T02TD2174E:27a-34: de la brten pa gang 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2174E:27a-35: rdo rje dril bu dag la ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-36: h'um dang aa yi sa bon las //
T02TD2174E:27a-38: sngags kyis bskyed pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-39: phyag mtshan lha ni gang 'dod bstim //
T02TD2174E:27a-40: phyag mtshan la sogs gzhan la yang //
T02TD2174E:27a-41: phyag mtshan snying po lha gsum dang //
T02TD2174E:27a-42: sgrub pa po yi las dang sbyar //
T02TD2174E:27a-43: phreng ba la yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2174E:27a-44: mtshan ldan yi ge aa yin no //
T02TD2174E:27a-45: rgyan dang rgyan cha la sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:27a-46: byin gyis brlab pa tsam ni bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-47: de dag thams cad kun la yang //
T02TD2174E:27a-48: bskyed dad bstim pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:27a-49: de nas byin rlabs dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-50: de nas mchod lnga dbul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:27a-51: de 'og l'a s+ya la sogs brgyad //
T02TD2174E:27a-52: mchod pa nyi shu po yang bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-0: gos dang rgyal mtshan la @27b sogs pa //
T02TD2174E:27b-1: rin chen bkra shis skra dang ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-2: rol mo la sogs cho ga rnams //
T02TD2174E:27b-3: rgyas par phul nas bstod pa bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-4: de nas bzlas brjod ci rang bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-5: spyan 'byed sngags la sogs pa ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-6: glog phreng rgyud du shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-7: yang na phyag mtshan la sogs kyi //
T02TD2174E:27b-8: cho ga bsdus par shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-9: shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga sogs //
T02TD2174E:27b-10: byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa tsam //
T02TD2174E:27b-11: de ltar rab gnas zin nas ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-12: bla ma mkhas pa de la ni /
T02TD2174E:27b-13: ci bdog yon rnams dbul bar bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-14: des ni bsod nams chen po thob //
T02TD2174E:27b-15: ji ltar phongs par 'gyur yang ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-16: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams ni dbul //
T02TD2174E:27b-17: ser sna can ni dbul mi nus //
T02TD2174E:27b-18: des ni sdig 'phel bsod nams med //
T02TD2174E:27b-19: rab gnas bzang po zin nas ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-20: rab gnas bzang por gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2174E:27b-21: rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ka ste sum cu gnyis pa'o /
T02TD2174E:27b-23: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:27b-24: 'chi ba bslu ba'i man ngag ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-25: 'chi rtags rnam par bstan pa dang //
T02TD2174E:27b-26: 'chi bslu cho ga rgyas pa rnams //
T02TD2174E:27b-27: 'chi bslu chen por shes par bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-28: 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-29: gos sngon 'chi ba bslu ba mchog / man ngag cung zhig bkol nas bstan //
T02TD2174E:27b-30: spyir ni 'chi ba bslu ba la //
T02TD2174E:27b-31: dge ba'i phyogs ni mtha' yas mchog / gang byas kyang ni bzlog par 'gyur //
T02TD2174E:27b-32: gos sngon 'chi bslu'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2174E:27b-33: nad pa sems ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2174E:27b-34: gos sngon rna brgyud man ngag can //
T02TD2174E:27b-35: mkhas pa de ni spyan drangs la //
T02TD2174E:27b-36: gnas khang dgon par mandala bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-38: rgyan rnams ma lus dgram par bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-39: nad pa la ni chos bshad la //
T02TD2174E:27b-40: dang po sems ni dag par bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-41: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-42: nor rnams ma lus thams cad dang //
T02TD2174E:27b-43: rang lus srog dang bcas pa dbul//
T02TD2174E:27b-44: de ltar 'bul ba de la ni //
T02TD2174E:27b-45: dang po dbang bskur rdzogs pa la //
T02TD2174E:27b-46: de nas man ngag gzhan sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:27b-47: de ltar byas 'og sos gyur la //
T02TD2174E:27b-48: rang 'tsho rdzas tsam s'ar la sbyin //
T02TD2174E:27b-49: nor rdzas srog rnams dbul mi nus //
T02TD2174E:27b-50: ser sna can ni bzlog par dka' //
T02TD2174E:27b-51: de ltar ser sna can de la //
T02TD2174E:28a-1: bskur mi bya gzhan po bya //
T02TD2174E:28a-2: cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni //
T02TD2174E:28a-3: rgyas par byed na bskyed rim rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2174E:28a-4: yang na bsdus dang shin tu bsdus //
T02TD2174E:28a-5: de ltar byas 'og nad pas ni //
T02TD2174E:28a-6: khrus kyi rim pa rdzogs byas la //
T02TD2174E:28a-7: gos bzang byin brlabs bskon nas ni //
T02TD2174E:28a-8: shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas nas //
T02TD2174E:28a-9: mdun du mandala lnga byas te //
T02TD2174E:28a-11: de nas sdig bshags la sogs bya //
T02TD2174E:28a-12: nad pa de ni mi nus na //
T02TD2174E:28a-13: mchod g-yog dag gis byed du gzhug / de nas skyabs gsol tshigs bcad brjod //
T02TD2174E:28a-14: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02TD2174E:28a-15: sku mchog stobs ldan khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2174E:28a-16: gsung mchog sgra mchog 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:28a-17: thugs mchog ye shes ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:28a-18: sku mchog stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:28a-19: de nas lus 'bul zhes ni sbyar //
T02TD2174E:28a-20: bdag la gnod pa'i nad rnams kun //
T02TD2174E:28a-21: khyod kyi mthu yis sbyang du gsol //
T02TD2174E:28a-22: 'byung po'i gnod pa bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2174E:28a-23: zor dang dug rnams thams cad kyang //
T02TD2174E:28a-24: mthu stobs bdag pos bzlog tu gsol //
T02TD2174E:28a-25: bcom ldan khro chen rnam par rgyal //
T02TD2174E:28a-26: sku gsung thugs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:28a-27: dpal ldan mgon po nag po che //
T02TD2174E:28a-28: lus ngan rgyal po mthu bo che //
T02TD2174E:28a-29: khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02TD2174E:28a-30: rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po //
T02TD2174E:28a-31: ro langs ma ni mthu mo che //
T02TD2174E:28a-33: 'jigs byed ma ni mthu mo che //
T02TD2174E:28a-34: rdo rje lha mo 'od skyed ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-35: rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog ma ;
T02TD2174E:28a-36: / rdo rje lha mo kun bzang ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-37: rdo rje lha mo klu sgra can //
T02TD2174E:28a-38: khro mo chen mo srog gcod ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-39: khro mo chen mo dbugs rngub ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-40: khro mo chen mo khrag 'thung ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-41: khro mo chen mo sha za ma //
T02TD2174E:28a-42: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28a-43: de nas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug /
T02TD2174E:28a-44: de bzlas pas ni bzlog par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28a-45: dang po sku yi bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2174E:28a-46: lus kyi nad rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28a-47: de nas thugs dang gsung gis spyad //
T02TD2174E:28a-48: thal chen rakta byang chub sems //
T02TD2174E:28a-49: sbyang sogs byin brlabs byas nas ni //
T02TD2174E:28a-50: gnas gsum dag tu mtshan cing byug /
T02TD2174E:28b-0: @28b de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis //
T02TD2174E:28b-1: bkra shis tshigs bcad bton nas ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-2: nad rnams sdig sgrib bkru bar bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-3: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sngags //
T02TD2174E:28b-4: bzlas pas bde gshegs 'od zer bstim //
T02TD2174E:28b-5: de nas nad pa'i steng phyogs su //
T02TD2174E:28b-6: bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bzhugs bsams la //
T02TD2174E:28b-8: ya shes bdud rtsi snying gar gzung //
T02TD2174E:28b-9: de rnams byas pas 'chi ba bzlog /'chi bzlog chen po bya ba ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-10: sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-11: gtor chen la sogs gzhan yang bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28b-12: de ltar byas pas 'chi ba bzlog /
T02TD2174E:28b-13: rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la //
T02TD2174E:28b-14: man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa na //
T02TD2174E:28b-15: rlung dang thig le yi ge dang //
T02TD2174E:28b-16: gtum mo 'khor lo la sogs ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-17: 'chi bslu cho ga dag dang ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-18: bla ma'i man ngag brgyud pas bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28b-19: 'chi ba bslu ba'i sbyor ka ste sum cu gsum pa'o /
T02TD2174E:28b-21: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2174E:28b-22: stang stabs rim pa cung zhig bstan //
T02TD2174E:28b-23: shar phyogs g-yas brkyang la gnas nas //
T02TD2174E:28b-24: rkang pa dang ni lag pa yis //
T02TD2174E:28b-25: rdo rje rtse gsum stang stabs bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-26: gar bsgyur de ni thabs re bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-27: rkang lag mthun par bsgyur ba bzlog / lho ru g-yon brkyang la gnas nas //
T02TD2174E:28b-28: ral gri'am dbyug to 'dzin pas su //
T02TD2174E:28b-29: rkang pa lag pa gnyis kas su //
T02TD2174E:28b-30: sa dang par snang gnyis ka la //
T02TD2174E:28b-31: rin chen 'bar ma bre bar bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-32: nub phyogs g-yas brkyang la gnas nas //
T02TD2174E:28b-33: 'khor lo'am ral gri de bzhin bre //
T02TD2174E:28b-34: byang phyogs g-yon brkyang la gnas nas //
T02TD2174E:28b-35: rdo rje rgya gram tshul du bre //
T02TD2174E:28b-36: yang na zlum po la sogs rim //
T02TD2174E:28b-37: bsrung ba'i tshul du bya ba dang //
T02TD2174E:28b-38: phyogs bzhir 'byung po bkug nas ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-39: mnan cing bsnun pa'i tshul du bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-40: gzhan yang stang stabs rgyas pa ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-41: snyoms 'jug la sogs rgyud na gsal //
T02TD2174E:28b-42: mkhas pas de ru shas par bya //
T02TD2174E:28b-43: 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus //
T02TD2174E:28b-44: stang stabs sbyor ba 'di dag ni //
T02TD2174E:28b-45: bgegs bskrad don du nan tan bya'o //
T02TD2174E:28b-46: stang stabs kyi sbyor ka ste sum cu bzhi pa'o /
T02TD2174E:28b-48: // / ston pa phyag na rdo rje nas //
T02TD2174E:28b-49: mkha' 'gro ma ni yan chad du //
T02TD2174E:28b-50: brgyud pa'i rim pa'i man ngag 'di//
T02TD2174E:29a-0: @29a * // snying po la sogs sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2174E:29a-3: de rtsar h'um gi rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD2174E:29a-4: brtul chen po ni rnal 'byor la //
T02TD2174E:29a-5: lo gsum bar du snod brtags nas //
T02TD2174E:29a-6: bde ldan rin chen yang gter du //
T02TD2174E:29a-7: btsa' dka' dam bzhag byas nas gtad //
T02TD2174E:29a-8: rin chen rdzas dang srog lus kyis //
T02TD2174E:29a-9: bla ma mnyes pas man ngag thob //
T02TD2174E:29a-10: de bzhin phyi rabs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2174E:29a-11: de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2174E:29a-12: phyi rabs blo dman la sogs shing //
T02TD2174E:29a-13: ser sna la sogs g-yo sgyu can //
T02TD2174E:29a-14: sgom sgrub la sogs mi nus la //
T02TD2174E:29a-15: man ngag bstan na dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2174E:29a-16: de bas phyi rabs rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2174E:29a-17: snod ldan brtags la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2174E:29a-18: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i //
T02TD2174E:29a-19: rin chen phreng ba sbyor ka 'di //
T02TD2174E:29a-20: bdag gis snod ldan don brtsams pas //
T02TD2174E:29a-21: 'di brtsams pa yi dge ba yis //
T02TD2174E:29a-22: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang //
T02TD2174E:29a-23: bla med byang chub thob par shog / sbyor ka chen po'i man ngag slob dpon chen po bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2174E:29a-25: // / dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur ro//
